summary: Account Center Alpha site開啟Qfinder Pro權限
description:
Hi Andy

因為目前要測試:
 * WINQFD00-2058[Qfinder WIN] QID (Account Center v4) 相容性測試
 * LNXQFD00-1365 [Qfinder LNX] QID (Account Center v4) 相容性測試
 * MACQFD00-1552 [Qfinder MAC] QID (Account Center v4) 相容性測試

目前發現 Qfinder 之前都沒測過 alpha site (沒有加入)

 
h3. *Requirement:* 請您協助開啟Qfinder Pro的Alpha site權限

1. Qfinder 3個平台 在 alpha site 的 APP ID 分別是
 * 5644511aab6dd152e80ff571 ( windows)
 * 56445116ab6dd152e80ff55d (mac)
 * 5a9d026cab6dd17b26f7b1c9 (ubuntu)

2. 需要新增 的 redirect URL 為
 * [http://127.0.0.1:4242/oauth2/callback]
 * [http://127.0.0.1:14242/oauth2/callback]

summary: [UX Enhancement] Smarturl 跳轉失敗頁面敘述修改
description:
*User Story*
 # 使用smarturl(如[http://qlink.to/DCFormalQTS])想遠端存取NAS
 # 被導到跳轉失敗頁面
!image-2025-02-19-11-14-28-574.png|width=401,height=270!
 # 看到標題Select a connection method，誤會用底下這些IP可以成功連線到NAS
 # 不知道這些IP差在哪，用哪個連線有什麼差
 # 按go發現連線失敗，不知道該怎麼辦

*建議*
 # 標題改為 Failed to connect to \{device name}
 # 在每條IP前加上Ｘ的icon表示這是系統試過，無法連線的ip
 # 增加trouble shooting說明

summary: [Qmiix]  LINE Notify 作為第二個觸發後動作時訊息選擇欄位出現錯誤字串@EXECUTION_STATUS@
description:
Reproduce Steps：
1. 觸發後動作應用程式選擇 "LINE Notify"
2. 動作設定"傳送訊息"
3. 第二個觸發後動作應用程式選擇 "LINE Notify"
4. 動作設定"傳送訊息"
5. 點選訊息選擇欄

 

Actual Results:
出現錯誤字串@EXECUTION_STATUS@


Expect Results:
出現對應字串


Bug From：
VAPMIX00-3216 Full functional test for Qmiix 2.1.2 User Portal - Run#2

summary: [Qmiix] 無法新增 Gmail 帳號連線
description:
Reproduce Steps：
1. 安裝 qmiixagent_2.1.54_x86_64.qpkg
2. Cloud 登入後點擊 Create new miixes
3. 進入搜尋頁面找到 Gmail 後進行帳號連線
 
Actual Results:
無法新增 Gmail 帳號連線，顯示"系統已封鎖這個應用程式"
 
 
Expect Results:
可以新增 Gmail 帳號連線
 
Bug From：
VAPMIX00-3216 Full functional test for Qmiix 2.1.2 User Portal - Run#2

summary: [Qmiix] 在 Android 上找不到對應新版本的 Qmiix APP
description:
Reproduce Steps：
1. Play 商店找尋 Qmiix

Actual Results:
找不到對應新版本的 Qmiix APP


Expect Results:
找得到對應新版本的 Qmiix APP

Bug From：
VAPMIX00-3216 Full functional test for Qmiix 2.1.2 User Portal - Run#2

summary: [Qmiix] 在 IOS 上 Qmiix APP 觸發動作選擇 LINE Notify 後，在指定動作要素時無法輸入訊息
description:
Reproduce Steps：
1. 在 APP Store 上安裝 Qmiix
2. 開啟 Qmiix
3. 點擊"建立 Miix"
4. 觸發應用程式選擇"iOS 媒體"
5. 觸發程序選擇"Add a new photo"
6. 觸發動作選擇 LINE Notify

Actual Results:
在指定動作要素時無法輸入訊息


Expect Results:
在指定動作要素時可以輸入訊息

Bug From：
VAPMIX00-3216 Full functional test for Qmiix 2.1.2 User Portal - Run#2

summary: [h5.3.0][License Center]FW h5.2.4 升 h5.3.0 License狀態變更為 不合法使用
description:
Summary: FW h5.2.4 升 h5.3.0 Qboost無法更新版本

Steps:

1.FW h5.2.4 / License 1.9.49 掛載License- CAYIN / DA Drive / Qfiling / Hybridmount

2.FW提升至h5.3.0 / License 2.0.13

3.開啟License Center 

Actual Result:  狀態顯示 不合法使用 - 有一或多份授權已不在有效

Expect Result :  狀態應為 有效

 

note: 刪除License 在執行Recovery License 可排除此問題

 

[http://10.64.109.155:8080/cgi-bin/]

dqv / Dqv61614

summary: [Licesne Center][HA_V1]h5.2.4.3079 升級至 h5.3.0.3080 後 LicenseCenter 2.0.13 內的授權變為"不合法使用"狀態
description:
Reproduce Steps：
1. 於 h5.2.4.3079 安裝 McAfee 及 CayinMSP 授權
2. 升級至 h5.3.0.3080
3. 查看 LicenseCenter
 
Actual Results:
授權變為"不合法使用"狀態
 
Expect Results:
授權狀態正常，可以正常使用
 
Bug From：
內部測試

summary: [MPM Confirm] [QNAP live update] [QuTS Hero] License Center 2.0.13 release for QuTS Hero 5.3.x
description:
Dear DQVs,

Please verify the latest version of License Center QPKG.
h2. [注意]

此單目的為上架到QuTS hero h5.3.0 App Center，
除了原本的功能測試外，{color:#ff0000}請DQV在hero h5.3.0 且有HA服務的環境下，
測試QPKG在HA Manager執行takeover後，還可以運作正常。{color}

{color:#ff0000}[QPKG Support HA 測試說明.pptx|https://ieinet-my.sharepoint.com/:p:/g/personal/seanchang_qnap_com/EeRAGxARoyVNsFlM2t7yAIYB2XGYf-XOe2DvDvjfZyNO1A?e=SMA3Ed&isSPOFile=1]{color}

h2. [Bugs Fixed from v2.0.11]
* VAPLCCT0-1637 [Hero_HA][License Center] HA架構下 FW Rolling Update 後 License Center 無法開啟
* VAPLCCT0-1650 [Hero_HA][License Center] Switchover後 License Center CUP使用率異常上升


h2. [Bugs Fixed from v2.0.10]
* VAPLCCT0-1581 [Hero_HA][License Center] 腦裂後 Local License 啟用狀態與Cloud License Server不一致


h2. [Bugs Fixed from v2.0.8]
* VAPLCCT0-1581 [Hero_HA][License Center] 腦裂後 Local License 啟用狀態與Cloud License Server不一致
* VAPLCCT0-1591 [License Center][UI] Offline Deactivation 建立 luf 檔案頁面文字會超出範圍
* QTSHBM00-3398 [Hero_HA] [Hybridmount] 掛載HM License 建立HM Cache mount*3 Swithover後 在License存在 但變更為Non-Cache mount

summary: [Hero_HA][License Center]Removed Passive Node 進行 License 移除,Cluster 再 Add Passive Node --> Passive Node 存在已移除的 License 並顯示 Valid. (License Manager 顯示已停用)
description:
Summary : [Hero_HA][License Center]Removed Passive Node 進行 License 移除,Cluster 再 Add Passive Node --> Passive Node 存在已移除的 License 並顯示 Valid. (License Manager 顯示已停用)

 

Steps:

1.HAr架構 Active NAS_A(10.64.109.155) /Passive NAS_B(10.64.109.156) 掛載CAYIN *2

2.Remove Passive NAS_B

3.NAS_B 開啟License Center Recover License 顯示 Step 1掛載CAYIN License

4.NAS_B Deactive CAYIN

5.NAS_A Add Passive Node NAS_B

6.開License Center 以及License Manager

Actual Result: License Center Passive仍然有CAYIN License  但License Manager顯示License 未啟用

Expect Result: License Center Passive應無CAYIN License

 

Note: 可在License Center Passive Node頁簽中 移除License 排除此現象

 

[https://10.64.109.154/cgi-bin/]

[https://10.64.109.155/cgi-bin/]

[https://10.64.109.156/cgi-bin/]

dqv / Dqv61614

description:
Overview：

[HA][Licesne Center] QuTS hero h5.3.0 HA 環境下，無法啟用授權

Reproduce Steps：

1.登入 QuTS hero h5.3.0 (啟用 HA 環境)
2.安裝下列 QPKG
 - qvr-face-insight_2.1.0.1119_20250123_x86
 - qvr-human_2.2.0.0860_20240509_x86
 - QVRSmartClient_2.7.0.0997_20240923_x86
 - qvr-smart-search_2.1.0.1130_20250203_x86
 - QVRCenter_2.2.1.1152_20250225_x86_64
 - QVREliteServer_2.7.0.1147_20250220_x86_64
 - QVRProServer_2.7.0.1147_20250220_x86_64
3.於 License Center 2.0.9 啟用下列 License
 - QVR Face Insight - 1 Task
 - QVR Human - 1 Camera
 - QVR AI Pack
 - QVR Center - Manage 1 Server
 - CAYIN MediaSign Player - Basic version
 - QVR Elite 1 camera
 - QVR Pro Gold
4.等待 1 小時

Actual Results：

1.請參考附檔，新增過程皆正常，1 小時後下列授權顯示為不合法使用
 - QVR Face Insight - 1 Task
 - QVR Human - 1 Camera
 - QVR AI Pack
 - QVR Center - Manage 1 Server
 - CAYIN MediaSign Player - Basic version
 - QVR Pro Gold
2.後續更新至 License Center 2.0.10 後，問題無恢復

Expected Results：

可啟用授權

Bug From：

VAPLCCT0-1611 [LC-compatibility test] [APP Testing] [QuTS Hero] License Center 2.0.10 release for QuTS Hero 5.3.x

summary: [QuTS Hero] License Center 2.0.10 release for QuTS Hero 5.3.x
[QuTS Hero] License Center 2.0.10 release for QuTS Hero 5.3.x
description:
Dear DQVs,

Please verify the latest version of License Center QPKG.
h2. [注意]

此單目的為上架到QuTS hero h5.3.0 App Center，
除了原本的功能測試外，{color:#ff0000}請DQV在hero h5.3.0 且有HA服務的環境下，
測試QPKG在HA Manager執行takeover後，還可以運作正常。{color}

{color:#ff0000}[QPKG Support HA 測試說明.pptx|https://ieinet-my.sharepoint.com/:p:/g/personal/seanchang_qnap_com/EeRAGxARoyVNsFlM2t7yAIYB2XGYf-XOe2DvDvjfZyNO1A?e=SMA3Ed&isSPOFile=1]{color}

h2. [Bugs Fixed from v2.0.8]
* VAPLCCT0-1581 [Hero_HA][License Center] 腦裂後 Local License 啟用狀態與Cloud License Server不一致
* VAPLCCT0-1591 [License Center][UI] Offline Deactivation 建立 luf 檔案頁面文字會超出範圍
* QTSHBM00-3398 [Hero_HA] [Hybridmount] 掛載HM License 建立HM Cache mount*3 Swithover後 在License存在 但變更為Non-Cache mount

summary: [MPM Confirm] [QNAP live update] [QuTS Hero] License Center 1.9.49 release for QuTS Hero 5.2.x
description:
Hi DQV, 

Please help to run the basic functional test for latest version.

* [Bugs Fixed] 
** VAPLCCT0-1500	[License Center] 於 License Center 啟用 License 後 QuLog Center 並無相關 Log 紀錄
** VAPLCCT0-1472	[License Center][QuTScloud hero] QuTScloud hero 5.2.3, License Center 1.9.43 - About 右下角未正確顯示 QuTScloud hero Icon

* [Security Issues] 
** INTSI000-7362 [QPKG:License Center][QTS][Security][Medium][V3] XSS in activation.html(lang) - CVE-2024-50406 (Web Hacker)
** VAPLCCT0-1508 [License Center] INTSI000-7556 User can do XSS on License key name when any victim activate their product with attacker license key

summary: [MPM Confirm] [QNAP live update] [QuTS Hero] License Center 2.0.9 release for QuTS Hero 5.3.x
description:
Dear DQVs,

Please verify the latest version of License Center QPKG.
h2. [注意]

此單目的為上架到QuTS hero h5.3.0 App Center，
除了原本的功能測試外，{color:#ff0000}請DQV在hero h5.3.0 且有HA服務的環境下，
測試QPKG在HA Manager執行takeover後，還可以運作正常。{color}

{color:#ff0000}[QPKG Support HA 測試說明.pptx|https://ieinet-my.sharepoint.com/:p:/g/personal/seanchang_qnap_com/EeRAGxARoyVNsFlM2t7yAIYB2XGYf-XOe2DvDvjfZyNO1A?e=SMA3Ed&isSPOFile=1]{color}
h2. [New Features & Changes]
* License Center supports HA Manager’s new filesync method for syncing configuration data, replacing the previous snapsync approach. 

h2. [Bugs Fixed from v2.0.8]
* VAPLCCT0-1579 [Hero_HA][License Center] Remove Cluster 後執行 Recover License - Multiple Seats 數量錯誤
* VAPLCCT0-1580 [h5.3.0][License Center] 非 HA 狀態下 Offline 啟用 License 無顯示成功資訊
* VAPLCCT0-1581 [Hero_HA][License Center] 腦裂後 Local License 啟用狀態與Cloud License Server不一致

summary: [License Center] INTSI000-7556 User can do XSS on License key name when any victim activate their product with attacker license key
description: Summary: Any non-admin user can do XSS on Admin via License key name when any victim try to activate their product with Attacker license key. Steps: ==== 1. go to [https://software.qnap.com/boxafe-trial.html]  generate free license here and you can see license added in  [https://license.qnap.com/#!/my_license#%2F] 2 . Now in [https://license.qnap.com/#!/my_license#] Just change the name of license to this xss payload "> save it.. 3 . Open the license key and Click on GET LICENSE KEY.. just copy the license key . 4.  Go to QutsCloud and open LICENSE CENTER Click on Activate license Click on Activate with License Key and add key here.. Click on Verify key Stored XSS executed... Mitigation: ======== Filter license name in QutsCloud while activate.. Andy Fung 馮子輝上午 10:20 License Center 的Security Issue  https://qnap-jira.qnap.com.tw/browse/INTSI000-7556 這張單 要請你幫忙開出Bug 我們修好了 要進code~ Andy Fung 馮子輝上午 10:27 簡單來說就是 駭客可以把License Name改成一個 html 格式的東西，當License Center 啟用的時候 會跑出塞在License Name裡面的 code  但是做不了什麼

summary: [RD owner] As a HA user, I would like to activate license using License Key under HA Mode, so I can activate other QID owner's license
description:
h3. *Acceptance Criteria*
h4. *1. Header*
 * *Title:* License Activation - Active and Passive Nodes
 * *Subtitle:* Activate your licenses for both nodes using the same or different license keys.

h4. *2. Content*
 * *Step 1: License Key Input*
 ** Provide fields for entering license keys for both nodes.
 ** Display a checkbox for “Same as Active Node.”
 *** When checked:
 **** Only the Active Node license key is required.
 **** Passive Node input is disabled and mirrors the Active Node’s key.
 *** When unchecked:
 **** Both Active and Passive Node license key inputs are editable.
 ** *Validation:*
 *** Ensure both license keys belong to the same product.
 **** *Error Message:*
 ***** “The License Keys entered do not belong to the same product. Please enter valid keys.”
 *** Ensure entered keys are valid (25 characters) and matches format. 
 * *Step 2: Enter Seat Counts*
 ** *For Unified View (Same as Active Node)*
 *** *Behavior:*
 **** When the “Same as Active Node” checkbox is checked:
 **** The Passive Node seat input is disabled and mirrors the value entered for the Active Node.
 **** Users only enter seat counts for the Active Node.
 **** The Passive Node’s available seats are validated automatically against the Active Node’s input.
 *** *Seat Availability:* Ensure the total seats assigned do not exceed the available seats on either node.
 *** *Minimum Requirement:* Ensure at least 2 total seats (1 per node).
 **** If insufficient seats for both nodes:
 ***** *Message:* “At least 2 seats are required to activate the license on both nodes.”
 ** *For Split View (Different License Keys)*
 *** *Behavior:*
 **** When the “Same as Active Node” checkbox is unchecked:
 **** Both Active Node and Passive Node seat counts are managed independently.
 **** Users can enter separate license keys and adjust seat counts for each node.
 *** *Consistency:* Ensure the Active Node seat count does not exceed the Passive Node’s available seats.
 *** *Error Messages:*
 **** If insufficient seats for Passive Node:
 ***** *Message:* “The Passive Node license has only \{passive_seat_num} seat(s) available. Reduce the seat count for the Active Node.”
 * *Step 3: License Activation*
 ** “Activate” button triggers the license activation process for both nodes.
 ** *Success Message:*
 *** “License successfully activated for Active and Passive Nodes.”
 ** *Failure Handling:*
 *** Display error messages based on specific failure causes (e.g., insufficient seats, invalid keys or app return errors).

----
h3. *Error Handling Summary*
||*Scenario*||*Error Message*||
|Keys Do Not Belong to the Same Product|The License Keys entered do not belong to the same product. Please enter valid keys.|
|Insufficient Seats (Unified View)|At least 2 seats are required to activate the license on both nodes.|
|Insufficient Seats on Passive Node (Split)|The Passive Node license has only \{passive_seat_num} seat(s) available. Reduce the seat count for the Active Node.|

summary: [LC-compatibility test] [APP Testing] [QuTS Hero] License Center 2.0.3 release for QuTS Hero 5.x.x
description:
Dear DQVs,

Please verify the latest version of myQNAPcloud QPKG.
h2. [注意]

此單目的為上架到QuTS hero h5.3.0 App Center，
除了原本的功能測試外，{color:#ff0000}請DQV在hero h5.3.0 且有HA服務的環境下，
測試QPKG在HA Manager執行takeover後，還可以運作正常。{color}

{color:#ff0000}[QPKG Support HA 測試說明.pptx|https://ieinet-my.sharepoint.com/:p:/g/personal/seanchang_qnap_com/EeRAGxARoyVNsFlM2t7yAIYB2XGYf-XOe2DvDvjfZyNO1A?e=SMA3Ed&isSPOFile=1]{color}
h2. [New Features]
* Support for High Availability (HA) Environments
** Detail Spec for Online Activation / Deactivation / Recover License: VAPLCCT0-1461

h2. [Bugs Fixed]
* VAPLCCT0-1481 [Hero_HA] [License Center] 當Active node License數量 大於 Passive node時 UI仍顯示Activate on Passive Node
* VAPLCCT0-1482 [Hero_HA] [License Center] 執行Activate on Passive Node啟用License Seats數量錯誤
* VAPLCCT0-1483 [Hero_HA] [License Center] QuLog Center無紀錄License啟用/停用 節點資訊
* VAPLCCT0-1477 [Hero_HA][License Center] CAYIN License無法使用QID再次啟用 – 當License曾經啟用
* VAPLCCT0-1478 [Hero_HA] [License Center] 選擇Active License UI錯誤-應調整為radio button
* VAPLCCT0-1479 [Hero_HA] [License Center] 啟用Qsirch Premium License 但Qsirch授權狀態未變更
* VAPLCCT0-1480 [Hero_HA] [License Center] Active node解除License 但Passive node未同步解除 - 當Mismatch發生時

summary: QTS QPKG License Center 內建 QPKG 數位簽章的憑證過期日須為 QTS Firmware 的過期日(2027/12/16)+1
description:
Hi Andy,

要通知你 針對 QTS QPKG License Center 由於內建 QPKG 數位簽章的憑證過期日須為 QTS Firmware 的過期日 (2027/12/16)+1 也就是 2027/12/17 目前已於 2024/12/17 重新建立新版憑證 需要請你協助以下事項:
 # 參考以下投影片 了解目前過期後的行為 (P. 3~6) 以及處理流程 (P. 10~11)
 # 請 RD 確認新 build 的 QPKG 其數位簽章資訊是否已更新
 # 在舊版憑證到期 (2025/3/17) 兩至三個月前 將新版 QPKG 上架

[https://ieinet-my.sharepoint.com/:p:/g/personal/kevinliao_qnap_com/EVVhRRQbRnJPvc4WON6j_BQBnUDOBTaD17FDVDMxKxk0vA?e=CzpbOF]

summary: [QuTS Hero] License Center 2.0.1 release for QuTS Hero 5.x.x
description:
Dear DQVs,

Please verify the latest version of myQNAPcloud QPKG.
h2. [注意]

此單目的為上架到QuTS hero h5.3.0 App Center，
除了原本的功能測試外，{color:#ff0000}請DQV在hero h5.3.0 且有HA服務的環境下，
測試QPKG在HA Manager執行takeover後，還可以運作正常。{color}

{color:#ff0000}[QPKG Support HA 測試說明.pptx|https://ieinet-my.sharepoint.com/:p:/g/personal/seanchang_qnap_com/EeRAGxARoyVNsFlM2t7yAIYB2XGYf-XOe2DvDvjfZyNO1A?e=SMA3Ed&isSPOFile=1]{color}
h2. [New Features]
* Support for High Availability (HA) Environments
** Detail Spec for Online Activation / Deactivation / Recover License: VAPLCCT0-1461

summary: [RD owner] License Center Support HA Manager to Activate/Deactivate/Recover License on Active and Passive Node
description:
h2. Activate licenses on both the Active and Passive Nodes
# User clicks the "+ Activate License" button in the License Center.
# License Center opens an activation wizard and prompts the user to select a license and its seat quantity for the Active Node.
#* Under HA Management Mode, license selection will be changed from checkbox to radio button to avoid the complexity. 
# After selecting the license, clicking the Next button will prompts the user to select the same license for the Passive Node.
#* License Center only displays matching license options to prevent inconsistencies.
#* The Product dropdown list will be disabled and filtered product matches the Active Node's product
#* The available seats MUST be greater than the user activated seats on Active Node. Otherwise, it will be filtered. 
#* If user activate multi-seat during the Active Node, the seat number for the passive node will automatically filled in. 
# User completes the activation process by confirming the license and seat selections for both nodes.
# System activates the licenses on both nodes and displays a success message: {code}Licenses successfully activated for Active and Passive Nodes.{code}

h2. View a comparison of licenses between the Active and Passive Nodes
# User navigates to the License Center and selects the "HA Licenses" view.
# License Center displays two tabs: "Active Node Licenses" and "Passive Node Licenses."
# User can switch between tabs to view the licenses installed on each node.
# If there is a license mismatch between nodes, the Status displays the *Mismatch*.
#* Mismatch Detection: 
#** Compare licenses between Active and Passive Nodes (license type, seat count).
# User can mouseover on the question icon(?) to view detailed information about the license difference: {code}The licenses or seat quantities on the Active and Passive Nodes do not match.{code}

h2. Activate a license on the Passive Node based on the existing license configuration on the Active Node
# When a mismatch is detected, License Center displays an "Activate on Passive Node" icon for the license under Action column in the Active Node's tab.
# User clicks the "Activate on Passive Node" icon.
# License Center opens an activation wizard, filtering available licenses to show only those compatible with the Active Node's license.
#* Product type will be focused as the same type chosen from Active Node, and unable to change it.
#* Only displayed the filtered licenses. 
#** *Filter Condition:*
#**# Product Type
#**# Available Seats >= Seats Activated on Active Node
# User selects the matching license and seat quantity(Auto Fill-in) for the Passive Node.
# User click the Activate button
# System completes the activation and updates the license status across both nodes.

h2. Automatically deactivate a license on the Passive Node when deactivate it on the Active Node
# User selects a license on the Active Node and clicks "Deactivate" icon under Action column. 
# License Center prompts the user with the same deactivate dialog:
#* Choosing Deactivation Method:
#*# Deactivate using QID
#*# Offline Deactivation
#*# A Warning description display at the lower section: {code}"Deactivating this license on the Active Node will also deactivate it on the Passive Node. Do you wish to continue?{code}
# User confirms deactivation.
# License Center deactivates the license on both nodes.
# System displays a success message: {code}License successfully deactivated on Active and Passive Nodes.{code}

summary: License Center Support HA Manager to Online Activate/Deactivate/Recover License on Active and Passive Node
description:
h3. {color:red}v1 Stage ONLY support *QID and License Key Online* Activation. *Product Key/PAK and Offline* Activation will NOT be supported. {color}

h1. QPKG Download URL
License Center_2.0.1  
ftp://172.17.25.251/Daily_Build/Cloud_Dept/LicenseCenter/2.0.1

h1. Spec: 
h2. Activate licenses on both the Active and Passive Nodes
# User clicks the "+ Activate License" button in the License Center.
# License Center opens an activation wizard and prompts the user to select a license and its seat quantity for the Active Node.
#* Under HA Management Mode, license selection will be changed from checkbox to radio button to avoid the complexity. 
# After selecting the license, clicking the Next button will prompts the user to select the same license for the Passive Node.
#* License Center only displays matching license options to prevent inconsistencies.
#* The Product dropdown list will be disabled and filtered product matches the Active Node's product
#* The available seats MUST be greater than the user activated seats on Active Node. Otherwise, it will be filtered. 
#* If user activate multi-seat during the Active Node, the seat number for the passive node will automatically filled in. 
# User completes the activation process by confirming the license and seat selections for both nodes.
# System activates the licenses on both nodes and displays a success message: {code}Licenses successfully activated for Active and Passive Nodes.{code}

h2. View a comparison of licenses between the Active and Passive Nodes
# User navigates to the License Center and selects the "HA Licenses" view.
# License Center displays two tabs: "Active Node Licenses" and "Passive Node Licenses."
# User can switch between tabs to view the licenses installed on each node.
# If there is a license mismatch between nodes, the Status displays the *Mismatch*.
#* Mismatch Detection: 
#** Compare licenses between Active and Passive Nodes (license type, seat count).
# User can mouseover on the question icon(?) to view detailed information about the license difference: {code}The licenses or seat quantities on the Active and Passive Nodes do not match.{code}

h2. Activate a license on the Passive Node based on the existing license configuration on the Active Node
# When a mismatch is detected, License Center displays an "Activate on Passive Node" icon for the license under Action column in the Active Node's tab.
# User clicks the "Activate on Passive Node" icon.
# License Center opens an activation wizard, filtering available licenses to show only those compatible with the Active Node's license.
#* Product type will be focused as the same type chosen from Active Node, and unable to change it.
#* Only displayed the filtered licenses. 
#** *Filter Condition:*
#**# Product Type
#**# Available Seats >= Seats Activated on Active Node
# User selects the matching license and seat quantity(Auto Fill-in) for the Passive Node.
# User click the Activate button
# System completes the activation and updates the license status across both nodes.

h2. Automatically deactivate a license on the Passive Node when deactivate it on the Active Node
# User selects a license on the Active Node and clicks "Deactivate" icon under Action column. 
# License Center prompts the user with the same deactivate dialog:
#* Choosing Deactivation Method:
#*# Deactivate using QID
#*# Offline Deactivation
#*# A Warning description display at the lower section: {code}"Deactivating this license on the Active Node will also deactivate it on the Passive Node. Do you wish to continue?{code}
# User confirms deactivation.
# License Center deactivates the license on both nodes.
# System displays a success message: {code}License successfully deactivated on Active and Passive Nodes.{code}

h2. Recovery license for Active and Passive Node
* Clicking the "Recover License" option in the License Center sends a request to the License Server using the device's Hardware Serial Number (HWSN) and Firmware Serial Number (SUID).
* If any licenses match the provided HWSN and SUID but are not activated on the current device, the system will automatically activate those licenses.
* In HA mode:
** Licenses tied to the HWSN and SUID of both the Active Node and Passive Node will be recovered.
** Recovered licenses will be displayed under the respective tabs (Active Node and Passive Node).
* License Center will notify the user about the licenses has been successfully recovered.
* If no licenses match the provided information, an appropriate message is displayed (same as previous message).

summary: [Mantis #133941] [License Center] [QuTScloud] License Center 1.8.43 can't active License with FW c5.0.1.2374 - Error Code : -11
description:
Summary : License Center 1.8.43 can't active License with FW c5.0.1.2374 - Error Code : -11

Steps:
 # 使用ESXi建立VM 並安裝QuTScloud FW c5.0.1.2374
 # 登入QID 
 # 開啟License Center > Activate License > Activate with QNAP ID - Select License

Actual Result:  顯示 "The cloud server cannot be connected. Please check your internet connection and try again. (Error code : -11)

Expect Result : 可正常啟用License

 

note: 
 # Active with a License Key無法啟用 - 輸入License Key無顯示成功啟用
 # Office Activation無法啟用 - 無法產生Activation URL
 # FW c5.1.7.2739搭配相同License Center 1.8.43 可正常啟用

 

[https://10.6.11.162/cgi-bin/|https://10.6.8.54/cgi-bin/]

dqv / Dqv61614

 

0133941: Qutscloud entered maintenance mode and we can't get it out of maintenance mode.

[0133941: Qutscloud entered maintenance mode and we can't get it out of maintenance mode. - MantisBT (qnap.com.tw)|https://bugtracking.qnap.com.tw/mantis/view.php?id=133941]

summary: [MPM Confirm] [QNAP live update] [QVP] License Center 1.8.43 release
description:
Hi DQV, 

Please help to run the basic functional test for latest version. 
h3. {color:red}Notice: License Center 1.8.43 MUST release with QVP 2.5.2 {color} 

* [New features and changes] 
** Added "seats_to_activate" in the the response when client calling "after_activate" callback CLI. (Requested by QVR Team)
** VAPLCCT0-1134 - Add 3 additional system event logs

* [Security Issues] 
** INTSI000-7149	[QTS][Security][High][V4] Command Injection lead to pre-authenticated RCE in quick installation stage (Anh Nguyen Le Quoc

summary: [MPM Confirm] [QNAP live update] [QuTS Hero] License Center 1.8.43 release
description:
Hi DQV, 

Please help to run the basic functional test for latest version. {color:red}We have make the LicenseCenter compatible with QTS 5.0.x since 1.8.35. Please arrange extra tests using QTS 5.0.x. {color} It used to only work on QTS 5.1.x. 

* [New features and changes] 
** Added "seats_to_activate" in the the response when client calling "after_activate" callback CLI. (Requested by QVR Team)
** VAPLCCT0-1134 - Add 3 additional system event logs

* [Security Issues] 
** INTSI000-7149	[QTS][Security][High][V4] Command Injection lead to pre-authenticated RCE in quick installation stage (Anh Nguyen Le Quoc

summary: [QVR Center] 於 QVR Center 2.2.0.0927 內購買 254 個授權無法啟用
description:
Reproduce Steps：

1. 登入 QVR Center (未新增授權, 應可以再新增 254 個)
2. 查看授權頁面
3. 點擊購買按鈕
4. 選擇 QVR Center 一個月授權 * 254
5. 完成結帳並等待啟用
6. 確認有啟用 254 個授權

Actual Results：

於 QVR Center 2.2.0.0927 內購買 254 個授權無法啟用

Expected Results：
應可以啟用授權

Bug From：
QVRPOCEN-2778 [Teddy][Meiji][License & Plug-in] QVR Center 授權頁面點擊 Purchase 必須可以於內建視窗購買授權/啟用授權
https://qnap-jira.qnap.com.tw/browse/QVRPOCEN-2778

https://qnap-confluence.qnap.com.tw/display/QCLOUD/Streaming+upload+API
* 根據之前 design 文件與 Surveillance team 的討論，需要依照文件的內容再追加
** auto complete upload 功能。並要在發起時就由 client 指定多久後沒打 complete 時由 backend 幫忙做 complete
** 因為 streaming upload 無法事先靠 object size 來擋，所以需要考慮如何防範被 streaming upload 塞爆我們買的空間

* 仍需要與 Surv team 確認：
** 來取網址時是否要重新計時 auto complete upload 的 timeout
** 如果未指定 auto complete upload timeout 時，backend 最短可以在多久時間內自行 abort

description:
Couchbase and mongo benchmark test
 * Upload objects stress test
 * List objects in different parents (avoid being affected by cache)
 * Graph lookup
 * Batch updates (write concern)
 * Batch delete objects
 * Transaction
 * TTL
 * Check data consistency relevant settings

--------------

下面是 Couchbase 之前視訊介紹時提供的文件，而他們 2024/08/14 會來台灣，為了利於當天討論做更深入的了解，我們需要先看一下他們的文件並建立 Couchbase 測試帳號來實際跑跑看。

Couchbase data durability and transaction - 
[https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/data/transactions.html]

Couchbase index including Functional Index -
[https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/services-and-indexes/indexes/indexing-and-query-perf.html]

Couchbase Cloud Solution Capella Trial Sign-up - 
[https://cloud.couchbase.com/sign-up]

Capella Labs as a Beginner - 
[https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13gUzPqdO_FUoYHO1pJ6huU3imH4PWCVs]

--------------
[on-premise installation]
Here you go Couchbase installation guide.

On Couchbase trial account: it’s a credit-based commercial model and the cadence of credit burn depends on the cluster size you setup, and there scheduled hibernation to help you optimize your usage. On general we offer starter pack of 1000, 5000, and 25000 credits.

To have a general idea of how long these credits can sustain different types of workloads:
1. A single-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, applicable for only dev and testing workloads, costs:
a. ~200 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b. ~60 credits per month when scheduled to be on only during office hours
2. A 3-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, suitable production workloads and can hosts multiple applications with our bucket-based data structure, costs:
a. ~700 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b. ~200 credits per month when scheduled turned on only during office hours

Like I mentioned the key benefits of converting to Capella starter pack is the entitlement to Capella support service with a service level defined. If you would like to explore further, we can have @Tony Chung send you pricing ballparks.

安裝說明：
[https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/install-kubernetes.html]
[https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/howto-couchbase-create.html]
安裝完後可用如："couchbase://cb-example.q2.svc.cluster.local"進行連接

summary: [變更通知] 新增修改 NAS Model Name 功能
description:
Hi Everyone,

先前針對 NAS Model Name 客製化修改功能的影響普查已完成，該規格現已通過並進入開發階段。

變更重點： 

    當系統設有客製化名稱時，優先顯示客製化名稱，若無設置則顯示原 Model Name
    影響原 API/CLI : int HAL_MB_Get_Display_Name、int Get_Display_Model_Name
    新增 API/CLI : get_native_name，讓受影響的功能獲取原始 Model Name


舉例：假設原始的 NAS Model Name 為 TVS-882，並且燒入了一個客製化名稱為 MYTVS882，則 API/CLI 讀取結果如下

    get_display_name == MYTVS882​
    get_native_name == TVS-882​


目前受影響的功能皆已通知相關單位調整規格，若有問題請隨時與我聯繫，感謝大家協助！ 



Best Regard,

Cindy Jiang 江于昕

summary: Mantis and JIRA Issue Review and Customer Support

description:
預期的架構可以參考下面連結，裡面有含之前寫的 source code：
https://qnap-confluence.qnap.com.tw/display/QCLOUD/Search+JIRA+Issue

--
 這個系統的主要目的是將傳統的 JIRA issue 搜尋升級為基於 AI 的語義搜尋。目標要提供以下 APIs：
* /sync
** 使用指定的 jira account 身份去爬公司的 jira，把全部的 jira 資料轉成向量寫到向量db
* /query
** 基本功能是 query parameter 帶指定的 jira id 來撈出該 issue，另外也列出跟它相關的 jira ids
** 進階功能是要能靠模糊的語意，就能從向量 db 撈回相關的 issues。想像上可以有兩種 query parameter 合併使用，一個是想找的 jira title、content 關鍵字語意，另一個是指定只找跟哪個 team 有關
* /suggest
** 關於指定的 jira id，請 AI 給建議的解法

使用的向量db及 AI 是什麼不限制，可以先看看市面上有什麼好用或甚至免費的是否能滿足需求 (e.g. DeepSeek?)

summary: As an organization owner, I would like to purchase a myQNAPcloud Storage Business License via the QNAP Software Store so that my organization can access a dedicated shared storage space. - part3
description:
* Acceptance Criteria
*#  Organization Selection at Checkout
*#* Only org owner can purchased the Business Subscription
*#* The checkout process prompts the buyer to select an organization to which the license will be assigned.
*#* The selected organization is displayed in the order summary.
*#* Once purchased, the license is permanently tied to the selected organization and *cannot be transferred* to another organization.
*# Minimum License Quantity Requirement
*#* The system enforces a *minimum purchase quantity of 3 seats*.
*#* Buyers can *increase the quantity dynamically* before checkout.
*#* If the quantity is lower than 3, an *error message* is displayed:
*#** UI Message (Error Notification on Software Store):
*#** {code}Minimum purchase quantity for myQNAPcloud Storage Business is 3 seats.{code}
*# License Management & Assignment
*#* Once purchased, the license is *automatically assigned* to the selected organization.
*#* Software Store should *prevents purchasing multiple Business Licenses* for the same organization.
*#* Additional seats can only be acquired through the *[Upgrade Plan|https://software.qnap.com/upgrade/plan/]*.
*#* The *Organization Center dynamically checks available seats* before allowing the assignment of members.
*# Storage Quota Allocation
*#* *Each seat contributes 2TB* to the organization's total storage pool.
*#* Organization storage is *shared* among whole organization, but assigned individual member limits apply.
*#* Owners can configure *per-member storage limits* (200GB, 500GB, 1TB, No Limit).(TEM61510-19184)
*#* Unassigned seats contribute to the organization’s shared storage until assigned.
*#* Assigned seat to a member will NOT preserve the capacity. Q2 will only go into limited access when reached space limit. 
*#* The Account List displays each member’s assigned personal space limit.

* Product Attributes and Info: 
** [myQNAPcloud Storage Business | https://ieinet-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/g/personal/andyfung_qnap_com/EcCAD0K1BAlIsEoGIcpC9-QBDB-CQP4CZDxqbLHK1fKPlQ?e=usBhrN]
** Main Difference between Business and Regular Subscription Plan: 
**# ||Key||Value|| Notes||
|variant_feature| business| Business Subscription Plan | 
|single_device_multi_seat	|TRUE| Enable the quantity affect the quota_user| 
|quota_user| X| Dynamically changed based on quantity purchased on SW Store|
|org_support	|TRUE| | 
|quota_size	|2| Fixed Value | 
|unit|TB| Fixed Value | 
|org_only|	TRUE| Designed for SW Store to hide personal QID option |

Couchbase and mongo benchmark test
 * Upload objects stress test
 * List objects in different parents (avoid being affected by cache)
 * Graph lookup
 * Batch updates (write concern)
 * Batch delete objects
 * Transaction
 * TTL
 * Check data consistency relevant settings

--------------

下面是 Couchbase 之前視訊介紹時提供的文件，而他們 2024/08/14 會來台灣，為了利於當天討論做更深入的了解，我們需要先看一下他們的文件並建立 Couchbase 測試帳號來實際跑跑看。

Couchbase data durability and transaction - 
[https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/data/transactions.html]

Couchbase index including Functional Index -
[https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/services-and-indexes/indexes/indexing-and-query-perf.html]

Couchbase Cloud Solution Capella Trial Sign-up - 
[https://cloud.couchbase.com/sign-up]

Capella Labs as a Beginner - 
[https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13gUzPqdO_FUoYHO1pJ6huU3imH4PWCVs]

--------------
[on-premise installation]
Here you go Couchbase installation guide.

On Couchbase trial account: it’s a credit-based commercial model and the cadence of credit burn depends on the cluster size you setup, and there scheduled hibernation to help you optimize your usage. On general we offer starter pack of 1000, 5000, and 25000 credits.

To have a general idea of how long these credits can sustain different types of workloads:
1. A single-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, applicable for only dev and testing workloads, costs:
a. ~200 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b. ~60 credits per month when scheduled to be on only during office hours
2. A 3-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, suitable production workloads and can hosts multiple applications with our bucket-based data structure, costs:
a. ~700 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b. ~200 credits per month when scheduled turned on only during office hours

Like I mentioned the key benefits of converting to Capella starter pack is the entitlement to Capella support service with a service level defined. If you would like to explore further, we can have @Tony Chung send you pricing ballparks.

安裝說明：
[https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/install-kubernetes.html]
[https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/howto-couchbase-create.html]
安裝完後可用如："couchbase://cb-example.q2.svc.cluster.local"進行連接

summary: Change response code to int from string
description:
原本的 device api 回的 response 中的 code 是用 int 而非 string，導致 KoiMeeter 在解析 code 時會有 exception。
所以我們需要把 device avatar api response 的 code 從 string 改成 int，值的部分就參考舊的是怎麼用的。

在 code 的值仍要參考原 device api 時的值的大前提下，關於 pkg/common/daerr/ 下的檔案，有兩種處理方向：
1、思考能否轉換。以調整 daerr constructor 的方式來原 qerr 的部分轉換成 daerr 的時候 code 也從 string 變成 int
2、全部拿掉，直接寫成 device avatar 自己的

--
在 KoiMeeter 1.3.2.7 版本能複現這個問題，附件有附上 dev 及 alpha site 版本的 Android apk 檔。
Reproduce steps:
1、登入後，去更新自己的 device avatar
2、在 KoiMeeter 界面中，選完圖片回到有顯示「名稱」、「電話」、「電子郵件」的界面處，按右上角的打勾鈕
3、等待一下子就會彈出 Exception 的 dialog (見截圖)

完整 log 可參考附件，這裡附上 log 裡的關鍵片段：
{code}

03-21 10:48:17.961 10565 10565 E [KoiMeeter]AccountSettingViewModel$uploadAvatar: 	at com.qnap.koimeeter.data.source.remote.models.ResponseJsonAdapter.fromJson(ResponseJsonAdapter.kt:22)

03-21 10:48:17.961 10565 10565 E [KoiMeeter]AccountSettingViewModel$uploadAvatar: 	at okhttp3.internal.connection.RealCall$AsyncCall.run(RealCall.kt:519)
03-21 10:48:17.961 10565 10565 E [KoiMeeter]AccountSettingViewModel$uploadAvatar: 	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1162)
03-21 10:48:17.961 10565 10565 E [KoiMeeter]AccountSettingViewModel$uploadAvatar: 	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:636)
03-21 10:48:17.961 10565 10565 E [KoiMeeter]AccountSettingViewModel$uploadAvatar: 	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:764)
{code}

主要是能從上方 log 裡看到 KoiMeeter 在成功的打完 POST device avatar 後伴隨了一個 JsonDataException。這次的修改重點就是要確認改完後不會再讓對方因為 type 不 match 而發生了 JsonDataException。

之前在 qcloud 上有能夠上傳、取得、刪除 avatar 的 APIs，相關文件:
https://core.api.alpha-myqnapcloud.com/devdoc/apidoc/qcloud_api_1_2.html#!/device_avatar
{code}
POST /v1.2/device/{device id}/avatar
GET /v1.2/device/{device id}/avatar
DELETE /v1.2/device/{device id}/avatar
{code}

而 avatar APIs 目前已被拿掉了，因為：
1、相關的 python package 有 security issue
2、avatar APIs 沒什麼人在用

但後來發現該 API 還是有人會用到，所以打算改用 golang 寫一個新的 avatar APIs。
下面是當初移掉上述這三支 APIs 的commit 資訊：
https://sauron.qnap.com/cec-sw1/qcloud/api/-/commit/0504d8976b480104cf5b9e44569d07d7ae48232b

可以參考當時的邏輯來實作新的 avatar APIs

summary: As a org owner, I would like to have a enforcement option for SAML login, so org members can be forced to use SAML login without password
description:
h3. *Specification*
 # *Login Enforcement Option in SAML Settings*
 ** The organization owner can choose between *Optional* and *Required* from a dropdown list in Organization Center.
 ** When selecting {*}Optional{*}, the following hint is displayed:
_"Your members can log in to QNAP services using SSO or their QID password."_
 ** When selecting {*}Required{*}, the following hint is displayed:
_"Your members must log in to QNAP Account using SSO, and their QID password will no longer work."_
 ** If *Required* is selected, all organization members *must* use SAML SSO to log in. Their QNAP ID password authentication will be disabled.
 # *Exception for Organization Owners*
 ** Even if *Required* is enforced, *organization owners* can still log in using their QNAP ID username and password.
 ** This ensures that owners can still manage settings in the Organization Center if there are issues with the IdP.
 # *Handling Multiple Organizations with Different Settings*
 ** If a user belongs to {*}multiple organizations{*}, and at least *one* of them enforces SAML login, then:
 *** The user *must* log in using SAML SSO.
 *** Password-based login is {*}disabled for the user across all QNAP services{*}.
 ** If the user belongs to multiple organizations where *all* have *Optional* login enforcement, the user can choose to log in via either SSO or their QNAP ID password.
 # *Error Message When SAML is Enforced*
 ** If a user attempts to log in with their *QNAP ID password* while {*}at least one joined organization enforces SAML{*}, the following error message should be displayed:
*_"Your organization requires SSO login. Please sign in using SAML SSO."_*

----
h3. *Acceptance Criteria*
 # *Login Enforcement Setting*
 ** Organization owners can select either *Optional* or *Required* in the SAML settings dropdown.
 ** The correct hint text is displayed based on the selected option.
 ** Selecting *Required* ensures that all members (except owners) must use SAML SSO to log in.
 # *Organization Owner Exception*
 ** Organization owners can always log in using their {*}QNAP ID username and password{*}, even if *Required* is selected.
 ** Owners can access Organization Center and modify the login enforcement setting if necessary.
 # *Multiple Organizations Conflict Resolution*
 ** If a user is a member of multiple organizations, and *at least one* organization enforces {*}Required{*}, the user *must* log in via {*}SSO only{*}.
 ** The user cannot log in with their QNAP ID password, regardless of other organizations' settings.
 ** If all organizations have {*}Optional{*}, the user can log in via {*}either SSO or QNAP ID password{*}.
 # *Error Handling for Users Attempting Password Login*
 ** If a user tries to log in with a QNAP ID password while *Required* is enforced, they see the error:
*_"Your organization requires SSO login. Please sign in using SAML SSO. If you encounter issues, please contact your organization administrator."_*
 ** If a user enters an incorrect password multiple times (but is still allowed to log in with a password), standard QNAP ID lockout rules apply.

You are receiving this message because our records show you have made calls within the last 7 days to deprecated Amazon Athena APIs or use a deprecated Athena data catalog resource.

On October 31, 2025, Athena will remove the deprecated APIs from operation, causing any application code using the deprecated APIs to return an error. The deprecated APIs are only accessed through older Athena data catalog resources, which have been replaced by AWS Glue Data Catalog, and older versions of Athena drivers (prior to JDBC-3.x [1] and ODBC-2.x [2]) and AWS SDKs (prior to aws-sdk-java-2.x [3]).

To avoid disruption, perform the following steps to upgrade affected data catalogs, drivers, and SDKs prior to the deprecation date. Refer to the "Affected resources" tab for the data catalog ARNs and IAM roles or users that are using the deprecated APIs in your account. Once you remediate the affected resource, it will be removed from the "Affected resources" tab [4].

* If your affected resource is a data catalog in the format: arn:aws:athena:<region>:<aws_account_id>:datacatalog/AwsDataCatalog, migrate the data catalog to AWS Glue Data Catalog [5] using the AWS CLI: aws glue import-catalog-to-glue --region <region> --catalog-id <aws_account_id>
Imported glue catalog arn will be arn:aws:glue:<region>:<aws_account_id>:catalog
* If your affected resource is an IAM user or role, upgrade your Athena drivers [1][2] and AWS SDKs [3] to the latest versions.
* Modify your IAM roles or users and permissions to allow the replacement APIs and imported Glue catalog. Note that you do not need to remove permission to the deprecated APIs before you have validated permissions.

The following lists the deprecated APIs and replacement APIs that provide equivalent functionality (include both athena and glue permissions in your IAM policy).

athena:GetCatalogImportStatus | glue:GetCatalogImportStatus
athena:GetNamespaces | athena:ListDatabases and glue:GetDatabases
athena:GetTables | athena:ListTableMetadata and glue:GetTables
athena:GetCatalogs | athena:ListDataCatalogs
athena:GetNamespace | athena:GetDatabase and glue:GetDatabase
athena:GetTable | athena:GetTableMetadata and glue:GetTable
athena:RunQuery | athena:StartQueryExecution
athena:GetExecutionEngine | athena:GetWorkGroup

For more information, refer to AWS documentation on upgrading drivers [1][2], upgrading SDKs [3], and migrating catalogs [5]. If you have questions or concerns, please reach out to AWS Support [6].

[1] https://docs.aws.amazon.com/athena/latest/ug/jdbc-v3-driver.html
[2] https://docs.aws.amazon.com/athena/latest/ug/odbc-v2-driver.html
[3] https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sdkref/latest/guide/version-support-matrix.html
[4] https://docs.aws.amazon.com/health/latest/ug/aws-health-planned-lifecycle-events.html

Implement API for setup storage limit
description:
可以寫一支新的 API 讓前端能調整 personal space 的預設 total size 值：
* 如果指定的新 limit 會造成有些人的 personal space 變成已達上限時，該 API 要回指定 error 讓前端知道要彈 warning dialog
* 此 API 可提供一個 force=true 的參數，好讓前端能在上述情況下時仍能調整 storage limit 而不會收到 error response
* 此 API 寫入成功時，要整調該 org 底下全部 regions 的 personal spaces 的 total size (如果 personal space 的 owner 是在 exception list 中時，則無須調整 total size)

summary: Implement APIs for get/update/delete exception list
description:
需要有兩支新的 APIs 以達到：
1、列出可選擇加到 exception list 裡的 org members 有誰
2、能加入、刪除 exception list 裡的人們

summary: Discussion, code review and license updater implementation
Adjust relevant org spaces total size when storage limit or exception list changed
Adjust personal space, acl, and profile when the user is revoked
description:
* Revoke 要去更新 license 裡的 user[] 欄位時，會需要用到這支 API:
** https://core.dev.myqnapcloud.io/devdoc/apidoc/qcloud_license_v1_2.html#!/license.json/unbind_users_from_license_delete_8

* 而在打上述 API 時，預期中當下 q2 backend 拿到的會是 org center frontend 來的 access token，所以會需要先做一次 exchange token 取得 *license.write* scope 後才有辦法打上述 API
** 相關流程可以參考 [1c0e25034d068b9518cd8697410398871ac860fb|https://qif-gitlab.dev-myqnapcloud.com/q2/q2-backend/-/commit/1c0e25034d068b9518cd8697410398871ac860fb]

* 加入error message label
 * 思考如何以目前機制降低alert頻率

預期的架構可以參考下面連結，裡面有含之前寫的 source code：
https://qnap-confluence.qnap.com.tw/display/QCLOUD/Search+JIRA+Issue

--
 這個系統的主要目的是將傳統的 JIRA issue 搜尋升級為基於 AI 的語義搜尋。目標要提供以下 APIs：
* /sync
** 使用指定的 jira account 身份去爬公司的 jira，把全部的 jira 資料轉成向量寫到向量db
* /query
** 基本功能是 query parameter 帶指定的 jira id 來撈出該 issue，另外也列出跟它相關的 jira ids
** 進階功能是要能靠模糊的語意，就能從向量 db 撈回相關的 issues。想像上可以有兩種 query parameter 合併使用，一個是想找的 jira title、content 關鍵字語意，另一個是指定只找跟哪個 team 有關
* /suggest
** 關於指定的 jira id，請 AI 給建議的解法

使用的向量db及 AI 是什麼不限制，可以先看看市面上有什麼好用或甚至免費的是否能滿足需求 (e.g. DeepSeek?)

summary: Implement an api for deleting all objects in specified space - improvement - part2
description:
待解決問題：
 # 目前是收到request後以go routine方式執行，要調整成worker或其他方式進行
 # 目前功能實作是寫在SpaceObjResolver method內，但因為要寫object changes，這樣會把ObjChange dependency也納入其中，導致其他jobs有用到SpaceObjResolver的jobs也需要與cassandra連線，目前已有暫時解，看是否有其他更好的方式，例如將實作移出SpaceObjResolver，或是做一個專門對cassandra發changes的worker

Couchbase and mongo benchmark test
 * Upload objects stress test
 * List objects in different parents (avoid being affected by cache)
 * Graph lookup
 * Batch updates (write concern)
 * Batch delete objects
 * Transaction
 * TTL
 * Check data consistency relevant settings

--------------

下面是 Couchbase 之前視訊介紹時提供的文件，而他們 2024/08/14 會來台灣，為了利於當天討論做更深入的了解，我們需要先看一下他們的文件並建立 Couchbase 測試帳號來實際跑跑看。

Couchbase data durability and transaction - 
[https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/data/transactions.html]

Couchbase index including Functional Index -
[https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/services-and-indexes/indexes/indexing-and-query-perf.html]

Couchbase Cloud Solution Capella Trial Sign-up - 
[https://cloud.couchbase.com/sign-up]

Capella Labs as a Beginner - 
[https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13gUzPqdO_FUoYHO1pJ6huU3imH4PWCVs]

--------------
[on-premise installation]
Here you go Couchbase installation guide.

On Couchbase trial account: it’s a credit-based commercial model and the cadence of credit burn depends on the cluster size you setup, and there scheduled hibernation to help you optimize your usage. On general we offer starter pack of 1000, 5000, and 25000 credits.

To have a general idea of how long these credits can sustain different types of workloads:
1. A single-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, applicable for only dev and testing workloads, costs:
a. ~200 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b. ~60 credits per month when scheduled to be on only during office hours
2. A 3-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, suitable production workloads and can hosts multiple applications with our bucket-based data structure, costs:
a. ~700 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b. ~200 credits per month when scheduled turned on only during office hours

Like I mentioned the key benefits of converting to Capella starter pack is the entitlement to Capella support service with a service level defined. If you would like to explore further, we can have @Tony Chung send you pricing ballparks.

安裝說明：
[https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/install-kubernetes.html]
[https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/howto-couchbase-create.html]
安裝完後可用如："couchbase://cb-example.q2.svc.cluster.local"進行連接

summary: As an organization owner, I would like to purchase a myQNAPcloud Storage Business License via the QNAP Software Store so that my organization can access a dedicated shared storage space. - part2
description:
* Acceptance Criteria
*#  Organization Selection at Checkout
*#* Only org owner can purchased the Business Subscription
*#* The checkout process prompts the buyer to select an organization to which the license will be assigned.
*#* The selected organization is displayed in the order summary.
*#* Once purchased, the license is permanently tied to the selected organization and *cannot be transferred* to another organization.
*# Minimum License Quantity Requirement
*#* The system enforces a *minimum purchase quantity of 3 seats*.
*#* Buyers can *increase the quantity dynamically* before checkout.
*#* If the quantity is lower than 3, an *error message* is displayed:
*#** UI Message (Error Notification on Software Store):
*#** {code}Minimum purchase quantity for myQNAPcloud Storage Business is 3 seats.{code}
*# License Management & Assignment
*#* Once purchased, the license is *automatically assigned* to the selected organization.
*#* Software Store should *prevents purchasing multiple Business Licenses* for the same organization.
*#* Additional seats can only be acquired through the *[Upgrade Plan|https://software.qnap.com/upgrade/plan/]*.
*#* The *Organization Center dynamically checks available seats* before allowing the assignment of members.
*# Storage Quota Allocation
*#* *Each seat contributes 2TB* to the organization's total storage pool.
*#* Organization storage is *shared* among whole organization, but assigned individual member limits apply.
*#* Owners can configure *per-member storage limits* (200GB, 500GB, 1TB, No Limit).(TEM61510-19184)
*#* Unassigned seats contribute to the organization’s shared storage until assigned.
*#* Assigned seat to a member will NOT preserve the capacity. Q2 will only go into limited access when reached space limit. 
*#* The Account List displays each member’s assigned personal space limit.

* Product Attributes and Info: 
** [myQNAPcloud Storage Business | https://ieinet-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/g/personal/andyfung_qnap_com/EcCAD0K1BAlIsEoGIcpC9-QBDB-CQP4CZDxqbLHK1fKPlQ?e=usBhrN]
** Main Difference between Business and Regular Subscription Plan: 
**# ||Key||Value|| Notes||
|variant_feature| business| Business Subscription Plan | 
|single_device_multi_seat	|TRUE| Enable the quantity affect the quota_user| 
|quota_user| X| Dynamically changed based on quantity purchased on SW Store|
|org_support	|TRUE| | 
|quota_size	|2| Fixed Value | 
|unit|TB| Fixed Value | 
|org_only|	TRUE| Designed for SW Store to hide personal QID option |

summary: Modify myQNAPcloud Portal to Show Notification

As a QNAP user,   I want to transfer a QNAP device from my QID usage to org usage directly through the Portal,  so that the device can be managed under my organization without needing to initiate the transfer from the device - Part5
description:
_Acceptance Criteria:_
 * *Transfer Process:*
 ** Upon initiating the transfer from the Portal, an Org Token is generated and stored, which can only bind to the specified organization.
 ** The device rebinds to the organization upon its next heartbeat, using the Org Token (which must have device.bind permission).
 ** If the device receives updates via API calls before rebind, the original QID Token remains valid until the rebind is successful.
 ** After rebind, the device ID remains the same, and the user is prompted to assign the device to a Site or default to My Site.
 * *Access Control:*
 ** Clear the existing Access Control list.
 ** Switch the device to Specific Admin mode, accessible only by the Org Owner and Site Admin.
 * *SSL Certificate:*
 ** If using Let's Encrypt, the SSL certificate remains valid or a new one can be imported.
 ** If using TWCA:
 *** For QTS 5.1.0 and above, the certificate remains valid as long as License Center is installed.
 *** For QTS 5.1.0 and below or myQNAPcloud Portal purchases, the certificate is released since it doesn’t support organization usage.
 * *Notification:*
 ** A notification is sent to AMIZcloud/myQNAPcloud with the message: "Device \{device_name} has transferred from personal QNAP Account (a***g@qnap.com)."
 * *Friend's Device:*
 ** Remove the device from any Friend's Device lists where it was previously added.

----
_Common Tasks for Both Scenarios_
 * *AMIZcloud Data Handling:*
 ** The user is prompted to decide whether to clear or retain historical data (CPU/Memory/Storage Pool Usage/Volume Usage Trend/Enclosure Temperature, Fan Speed, Performance metrics, and Event Logs) collected by AMIZcloud Agent.
 * *DDNS:*
 ** DDNS settings are retained, and internal/external port modifications are detected and reported using the original token.
 * *myQNAPcloud Link:*
 ** CloudLink tunnel ID/Connection settings are retained.
 * *License Management:*
 ** The AMIZcloud Portal prompts the user to manually deactivate any licenses in License Center if they no longer apply, as license ownership and usage can differ between the owner and user.

summary: 2025 目標設定 & Meeting with Dr. Ken
專案導入 P1 模組指標說明 by DC
Support Multi-Seat Mechanism for User Based License
description:
* User Based 授權也會需要支援 Multi-Seat，所以將會沿用 single_device_multi_seat 這個 attribute 來達成效果。
* 如果 User 在 SW Store 選取了多個 Quantity，且授權支援 Multi-Seat，最終 Quantity 就會等於是 quota_user 的 value （與Device Based 的作法類似，只是 Device Based 修改 quota_device，User Based 修改 quota_user）
* 新增一個 org_only 的 attribute，代表這個授權只允許被組織所使用，這樣 SW Store 在讓消費者挑選授權要指定 QID 還是 Org 的選單內，就不會再有 My QID 的選項。
* 如果授權的 Owner 是 Organization，在License Manager 的 Activation and Installation 應該要傳 Org 資訊給前端顯示組織的名稱（Real-Time取得，避免組織名稱修改而錯誤）

summary: [Qlib] Remove qswiss middleware and implement alternatives
description:
由於qswiss用的otel版本過舊，而且otel的介面變動較快，會導致更新其他package時，可能會更新otel而造成衝突
是否可能讓呼叫端可選擇是否要印出特定url的request/response body?

summary: [Q2] Correct activity logs for copy object case
description:
共有三個情況需要處理：

1、跟 activity log 無直接關係，因為目前 portal 是用 mtime 當"更新時間"來顯示，所以被複制產生的 obj 如果 dst 跟 src 為同個 folder 時，user 會不易甚至無法辦別。為了避免混亂，所以決議讓複制產生的 obj 的所有時間欄位皆設成當下時間
2、copied event 的 activity log 應該是要產生在 src 端，而非 dst 端
3、在 dst 端需要補上新增 obj created event 的 activity log

--
註：
move object 時，在 src 及 dst 兩端的 folder 都會有 obj_moved 的 activity log。
而預期上做 copy object 時，在 scr 端會有 obj_copied 的 activity log，而 dst 端則會有 obj_added 的 activity log。

summary: [License Manager] Not allow special characters " * / : < > ? \ | in license name

本年度目標設定的流程將會進行調整，由一級主管先進行填寫。
公司希望能確保各單位目標與公司策略方向緊密扣合，因此要請各位根據上週策略會議之討論結果，先行擬定單位目標，並請於本周填寫完成 2025 年度目標設定表單(一級主管目標設定: 2/11-2/14 )。
 
確認各單位目標與公司方向一致後，再向下展開至各級主管及一般同仁的目標設定，以確保各層級目標能夠有效連結、方向一致，共同推動公司的發展。
 
2025年度目標設定表單已稍早於Notes發出，再請各位主管留意本次流程的調整，並於期限內完成填寫。
如有任何問題，請隨時與我聯繫，謝謝大家的配合！

[Qmiix] Handle access token/refresh token expiry issue for Amiz/NC integration
description:
目前在Amiz/NC整合的頁面，如果一開始user portal發現沒有connected account，會打qid auth的api換到一組新的access token/refresh token並建立connected account。
但是如果已經有既存的connected account，且其中的access token已經過期，則user portal會在test connected account的步驟失敗，並顯示如下的錯誤訊息：
https://qnap-jira.qnap.com.tw/browse/TEM61530-8268

預計進行的修改：
後端：如果refresh token過期而失敗，回傳refresh_token_failed
前端：如果error code是refresh_token_failed，需打qid auth api取得一組新的access token/refresh token並更新connected account

description:
URL 條正為：https://community.qnap.com/

* https://www.myqnapcloud.com/
* https://license.qnap.com/
* https://install.qnap.com/

Couchbase and mongo benchmark test
 * Upload objects stress test
 * List objects in different parents (avoid being affected by cache)
 * Graph lookup
 * Batch updates (write concern)
 * Batch delete objects
 * Transaction
 * TTL
 * Check data consistency relevant settings

--------------

下面是 Couchbase 之前視訊介紹時提供的文件，而他們 2024/08/14 會來台灣，為了利於當天討論做更深入的了解，我們需要先看一下他們的文件並建立 Couchbase 測試帳號來實際跑跑看。

Couchbase data durability and transaction - 
[https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/data/transactions.html]

Couchbase index including Functional Index -
[https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/services-and-indexes/indexes/indexing-and-query-perf.html]

Couchbase Cloud Solution Capella Trial Sign-up - 
[https://cloud.couchbase.com/sign-up]

Capella Labs as a Beginner - 
[https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13gUzPqdO_FUoYHO1pJ6huU3imH4PWCVs]

--------------
[on-premise installation]
Here you go Couchbase installation guide.

On Couchbase trial account: it’s a credit-based commercial model and the cadence of credit burn depends on the cluster size you setup, and there scheduled hibernation to help you optimize your usage. On general we offer starter pack of 1000, 5000, and 25000 credits.

To have a general idea of how long these credits can sustain different types of workloads:
1. A single-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, applicable for only dev and testing workloads, costs:
a. ~200 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b. ~60 credits per month when scheduled to be on only during office hours
2. A 3-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, suitable production workloads and can hosts multiple applications with our bucket-based data structure, costs:
a. ~700 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b. ~200 credits per month when scheduled turned on only during office hours

Like I mentioned the key benefits of converting to Capella starter pack is the entitlement to Capella support service with a service level defined. If you would like to explore further, we can have @Tony Chung send you pricing ballparks.

安裝說明：
[https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/install-kubernetes.html]
[https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/howto-couchbase-create.html]
安裝完後可用如："couchbase://cb-example.q2.svc.cluster.local"進行連接

之前在 qcloud 上有能夠上傳、取得、刪除 avatar 的 APIs，相關文件:
https://core.api.alpha-myqnapcloud.com/devdoc/apidoc/qcloud_api_1_2.html#!/device_avatar
{code}
POST /v1.2/device/{device id}/avatar
GET /v1.2/device/{device id}/avatar
DELETE /v1.2/device/{device id}/avatar
{code}

而 avatar APIs 目前已被拿掉了，因為：
1、相關的 python package 有 security issue
2、avatar APIs 沒什麼人在用

但後來發現該 API 還是有人會用到，所以打算改用 golang 寫一個新的 avatar APIs。
下面是當初移掉上述這三支 APIs 的commit 資訊：
https://sauron.qnap.com/cec-sw1/qcloud/api/-/commit/0504d8976b480104cf5b9e44569d07d7ae48232b

可以參考當時的邏輯來實作新的 avatar APIs

summary: As an organization owner, I want to assign personal space permissions to selected organization members so that only those permitted members can access the Organization Space with their dedicated personal folder
description:
* *Description:*
 ** *License Purchase and Seat Limit:*
The organization has purchased a limited number of business licenses (for example, 3 seats) that grant access to Organization Space. Out of potentially many organization members (e.g., 100), the organization owner must assign these seats only to the designated users.
 ** *License Assignment Process:*
Within the Organization Space Settings page, the organization owner is provided with an interface (e.g., a list or selector) that displays all organization members.
 *** The owner can select up to the number of purchased seats (e.g., 3) to grant them access to Organization Space.
 *** Once assigned, the permitted members (e.g., Alpha, Beta, Charles) will have the ability to access the Organization Space by logging in to the myQNAPcloud Portal and navigating to {*}Storage → Organization Space{*}.

 * *UI Behavior Based on Assignment:*
 ** *For Permitted Members:*
When an assigned member (with a valid license seat) logs in:
 *** If the member belongs to only one organization, the Organization Space is displayed immediately.
 *** If the member belongs to multiple organizations, they will first see a selection screen to choose an organization.
 *** Within the Organization Space, a default personal folder is created automatically with the member’s Display Name.
 *** The default folder is non-deletable (to ensure a consistent personal space) but can be renamed by the member.
 *** The “Owner” attribute of the folder reflects the owner of that personal space (i.e., the assigned member).
 ** *For Non-Permitted Members:*
Members who are not assigned a license seat will not see any Organization Space option in the UI.

*Acceptance Criteria:*
# *Assignment Interface:*
#* The Organization Space Settings page displays a clear list of all organization members with an option (e.g., checkboxes or a dropdown) for the organization owner to assign or revoke personal space permission.
#* The interface enforces the maximum number of assignments based on the purchased license seats (e.g., only 3 members can be assigned when 3 seats are available).
# *Notification and Confirmation:*
#* When assigning a license seat to a member, the system confirms the action and displays the number of remaining seats.
#* When revoking an assignment, the system warns the organization owner that the member will lose access to the Organization Space (with reference to the separate process for revoking permissions).
# *UI Visibility for Assigned Members:*
#* *For Assigned Members:*
#** Upon logging into the myQNAPcloud Portal, an assigned member sees the Organization Space option under {*}Storage{*}.
#** If the assigned member belongs to only one organization, the Organization Space is automatically loaded; if they belong to multiple organizations, a selection screen is presented.
#** In their Organization Space, a default personal folder is automatically generated, named with their Display Name.
#**  This folder:
#*** Cannot be deleted.
#*** Can be renamed by the assigned member.
#*** Displays the “Created By” field as the assigned member’s identity.
#* *For Non-Assigned Members:*
#** The Organization Space option is not visible in the UI.
# *License Count and Quota Awareness:*
#* The system displays the current number of assigned license seats versus the total purchased seats.
#* The overall organization storage quota calculation includes the space occupied by all personal folders (regardless of assignment status).
# *Post-Assignment Behavior:*
#* If a member’s license seat is later revoked (while still being a member of the organization), their existing personal folder remains intact and continues to count toward the organization’s storage quota. However, they no longer have access to the Organization Space feature.
#*  If a member leaves the organization or is removed, their personal folder becomes manageable by the organization owner (as per the separate revocation story).
# *Audit and Logging:*
#* Every assignment or revocation action is recorded in an audit log, noting the organization owner’s action, the affected member, the date, and time.

summary: As an organization owner, I want to revoke a member’s personal folder permission such that the folder becomes read-only and remains exclusively accessible to the member, so that private data is preserved without giving me direct access.
description:
*Description:*
 - The organization owner assigns personal folder permissions to specific members (e.g., Alpha, Beta, Charles) within the organization.
 - When the organization owner revokes a member’s personal folder permission (e.g., for Beta), the following occurs:
 -- *Read-Only Transition:*
Beta’s personal folder is switched to a read-only state.
 -- *Exclusive Access Maintained:*
Beta remains the sole user with access to her personal folder, ensuring privacy.
 -- *Quota Inclusion:*
Despite being read-only, Beta’s personal folder continues to count as part of the organization’s total storage quota.
 -- *Management Limitation:*
The organization owner or other organization members are not able to view or modify Beta’s folder content after revocation.
 -- *Post-Membership Management:*
Only when Beta is removed from the organization or leaves voluntarily will the folder be available for management (e.g., deletion or reassignment) by the organization owner.

*Acceptance Criteria:*
# *Revocation Confirmation:*
#* When the organization owner initiates the revocation for a member’s personal folder permission, a confirmation dialog must appear.
#* The dialog clearly states that:
#** The member’s folder will switch to read-only.
#** The folder will continue to count towards the organization’s total storage quota.
#** Only the member will have access to the folder’s content post-revocation.
#* The owner must confirm the action to proceed.
# *Folder Transition to Read-Only:*
#* Upon confirmation, the system automatically sets the targeted member’s folder (e.g., Beta’s folder) to read-only.
#* No modifications (uploads, deletions, edits) can be made to the folder’s content by anyone, including the organization owner.
#* The folder remains visible only to the original member in their account interface.
# *Quota Counting:*
#* The system continues to count the storage used by Beta’s read-only folder as part of the organization’s overall storage quota.
#* Storage metrics displayed in the Organization Center must include the space occupied by all personal folders, regardless of permission status.
# *Access Restrictions:*
#* After revocation, only the member (Beta) can access her personal folder.
#* The organization owner and other organization members are prevented from viewing or managing the folder’s content.
#* The folder does not appear in shared folder listings or any management interface accessible to the organization owner.
# *Post-Membership Management:*
#* If Beta is removed from the organization or leaves voluntarily, a notification or prompt informs the organization owner that Beta’s personal folder now becomes manageable.
#* The organization owner can then take further action (such as deletion or reassignment) on the folder as per established data management policies.
# *Audit Logging:*
#* All actions, including the revocation of permission and the transition of the folder status, must be logged in an audit log.
#* The audit log should include details such as the date, time, affected member, and the action performed by the organization owner.

summary: As an organization owner, I want to increase the number of licensed users by upgrading my existing myQNAPcloud Storage Business plan, so I can provide additional storage and personal space to new org members without purchasing a separate plan
description:
* *Acceptance Criteria*
*# Restriction on Purchasing Multiple Base Licenses
*#* The system prevents the organization owner from purchasing a second base license in the same region.
*#* If the owner attempts to buy a second base license, a warning message is displayed.
*# License Upgrade Process
*#* To increase user seats, the owner must upgrade through the Software Store upgrade plan page: https://software.qnap.com/upgrade/plan/.
*#* The upgrade interface allows the owner to increase the number of seats but does not allow downgrades.
*#* A confirmation step is required before proceeding with the upgrade.
*# License ID and System Updates
*#* Upon successful upgrade, Software Store generates a new License ID reflecting the increased seat quantity.
*#* License Server processes the upgrade by:
*#** Marking the old license as *upgraded*.
*#** Activating the new License ID with the updated seat quantity.
*#** Notifying Q2 Server of the license change.
*#* License / Q2 Server maintains a relationship between the old and new License IDs for tracking purposes.
*# Additional Storage Allocation
*#* Each additional seat added through the upgrade process grants *an extra 2TB of storage* to the organization.
*#* The updated total storage capacity is reflected in the organization’s details and storage allocation settings.
*#* Admins can view the total available organization storage after the upgrade.
*# Seamless Transition for Users
*#* The license upgrade process does not disrupt existing users’ access.
*#* Organization owner can immediately use the additional seats and expanded storage once the upgrade is completed.

summary: As an organization owner, I would like to purchase a myQNAPcloud Storage Business License via the QNAP Software Store so that my organization can access a dedicated shared storage space.
description:
* Acceptance Criteria
*#  Organization Selection at Checkout
*#* Only org owner can purchased the Business Subscription
*#* The checkout process prompts the buyer to select an organization to which the license will be assigned.
*#* The selected organization is displayed in the order summary.
*#* Once purchased, the license is permanently tied to the selected organization and *cannot be transferred* to another organization.
*# Minimum License Quantity Requirement
*#* The system enforces a *minimum purchase quantity of 3 seats*.
*#* Buyers can *increase the quantity dynamically* before checkout.
*#* If the quantity is lower than 3, an *error message* is displayed:
*#** UI Message (Error Notification on Software Store):
*#** {code}Minimum purchase quantity for myQNAPcloud Storage Business is 3 seats.{code}
*# License Management & Assignment
*#* Once purchased, the license is *automatically assigned* to the selected organization.
*#* Software Store should *prevents purchasing multiple Business Licenses* for the same organization.
*#* Additional seats can only be acquired through the *[Upgrade Plan|https://software.qnap.com/upgrade/plan/]*.
*#* The *Organization Center dynamically checks available seats* before allowing the assignment of members.
*# Storage Quota Allocation
*#* *Each seat contributes 2TB* to the organization's total storage pool.
*#* Organization storage is *shared* among whole organization, but assigned individual member limits apply.
*#* Owners can configure *per-member storage limits* (200GB, 500GB, 1TB, No Limit).(TEM61510-19184)
*#* Unassigned seats contribute to the organization’s shared storage until assigned.
*#* Assigned seat to a member will NOT preserve the capacity. Q2 will only go into limited access when reached space limit. 
*#* The Account List displays each member’s assigned personal space limit.

* Product Attributes and Info: 
** [myQNAPcloud Storage Business | https://ieinet-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/g/personal/andyfung_qnap_com/EcCAD0K1BAlIsEoGIcpC9-QBDB-CQP4CZDxqbLHK1fKPlQ?e=usBhrN]
** Main Difference between Business and Regular Subscription Plan: 
**# ||Key||Value|| Notes||
|variant_feature| business| Business Subscription Plan | 
|single_device_multi_seat	|TRUE| Enable the quantity affect the quota_user| 
|quota_user| X| Dynamically changed based on quantity purchased on SW Store|
|org_support	|TRUE| | 
|quota_size	|2| Fixed Value | 
|unit|TB| Fixed Value | 
|org_only|	TRUE| Designed for SW Store to hide personal QID option |

summary: Mantis 0137291: (JP Distributor - ELECOM) Failed to activate two product keys, and an 'Already in use' message appears.
description:
使用Product Key 啟用授權的時候，如果在Body裡面沒有攜帶 User ID，License Server 還是會允許授權啟用成功，但是License會變成沒有Owner。

調整方式：
* 如果在啟用Product Key 沒有帶User ID，需要使用 Access Token 反查 User 是誰，把License綁到這個User底下。
* 如果Access Token 是屬於 Organization Token，就一樣把License 歸屬到 Org 底下。
* 如果 Request Body 有特別攜帶 Org ID 或是 User ID 就以 Request Body 的為主。

summary: As a QNAP user,   I want to transfer a QNAP device from my QID usage to org usage directly through the Portal,  so that the device can be managed under my organization without needing to initiate the transfer from the device - Part2
description:
_Acceptance Criteria:_
 * *Transfer Process:*
 ** Upon initiating the transfer from the Portal, an Org Token is generated and stored, which can only bind to the specified organization.
 ** The device rebinds to the organization upon its next heartbeat, using the Org Token (which must have device.bind permission).
 ** If the device receives updates via API calls before rebind, the original QID Token remains valid until the rebind is successful.
 ** After rebind, the device ID remains the same, and the user is prompted to assign the device to a Site or default to My Site.
 * *Access Control:*
 ** Clear the existing Access Control list.
 ** Switch the device to Specific Admin mode, accessible only by the Org Owner and Site Admin.
 * *SSL Certificate:*
 ** If using Let's Encrypt, the SSL certificate remains valid or a new one can be imported.
 ** If using TWCA:
 *** For QTS 5.1.0 and above, the certificate remains valid as long as License Center is installed.
 *** For QTS 5.1.0 and below or myQNAPcloud Portal purchases, the certificate is released since it doesn’t support organization usage.
 * *Notification:*
 ** A notification is sent to AMIZcloud/myQNAPcloud with the message: "Device \{device_name} has transferred from personal QNAP Account (a***g@qnap.com)."
 * *Friend's Device:*
 ** Remove the device from any Friend's Device lists where it was previously added.

----
_Common Tasks for Both Scenarios_
 * *AMIZcloud Data Handling:*
 ** The user is prompted to decide whether to clear or retain historical data (CPU/Memory/Storage Pool Usage/Volume Usage Trend/Enclosure Temperature, Fan Speed, Performance metrics, and Event Logs) collected by AMIZcloud Agent.
 * *DDNS:*
 ** DDNS settings are retained, and internal/external port modifications are detected and reported using the original token.
 * *myQNAPcloud Link:*
 ** CloudLink tunnel ID/Connection settings are retained.
 * *License Management:*
 ** The AMIZcloud Portal prompts the user to manually deactivate any licenses in License Center if they no longer apply, as license ownership and usage can differ between the owner and user.

Couchbase and mongo benchmark test
 * Upload objects stress test
 * List objects in different parents (avoid being affected by cache)
 * Graph lookup
 * Batch updates (write concern)
 * Batch delete objects
 * Transaction
 * TTL
 * Check data consistency relevant settings

--------------

下面是 Couchbase 之前視訊介紹時提供的文件，而他們 2024/08/14 會來台灣，為了利於當天討論做更深入的了解，我們需要先看一下他們的文件並建立 Couchbase 測試帳號來實際跑跑看。

Couchbase data durability and transaction - 
[https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/data/transactions.html]

Couchbase index including Functional Index -
[https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/services-and-indexes/indexes/indexing-and-query-perf.html]

Couchbase Cloud Solution Capella Trial Sign-up - 
[https://cloud.couchbase.com/sign-up]

Capella Labs as a Beginner - 
[https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13gUzPqdO_FUoYHO1pJ6huU3imH4PWCVs]

--------------
[on-premise installation]
Here you go Couchbase installation guide.

On Couchbase trial account: it’s a credit-based commercial model and the cadence of credit burn depends on the cluster size you setup, and there scheduled hibernation to help you optimize your usage. On general we offer starter pack of 1000, 5000, and 25000 credits.

To have a general idea of how long these credits can sustain different types of workloads:
1. A single-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, applicable for only dev and testing workloads, costs:
a. ~200 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b. ~60 credits per month when scheduled to be on only during office hours
2. A 3-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, suitable production workloads and can hosts multiple applications with our bucket-based data structure, costs:
a. ~700 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b. ~200 credits per month when scheduled turned on only during office hours

Like I mentioned the key benefits of converting to Capella starter pack is the entitlement to Capella support service with a service level defined. If you would like to explore further, we can have @Tony Chung send you pricing ballparks.

安裝說明：
[https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/install-kubernetes.html]
[https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/howto-couchbase-create.html]
安裝完後可用如："couchbase://cb-example.q2.svc.cluster.local"進行連接

該測項下面有三個子測項，經常會隨機 fail 在其中一項中
https://qif-gitlab.dev-myqnapcloud.com/q2/q2-backend/-/jobs/464944/raw
{code}
--- FAIL: TestObjectWORMAPI (41.17s)
    --- PASS: TestObjectWORMAPI/WORM_folder_-_year (14.68s)
    --- PASS: TestObjectWORMAPI/WORM_folder_-_month (12.39s)
    --- FAIL: TestObjectWORMAPI/WORM_folder_-_day (14.07s)
{code}

需要處理的問題點：
1、go routine 造成的 race condition
2、因為依賴 complete upload 時才會去起 go routine 執行 applyWORM() 的流程，而造成不確定需要 sleep 多久等 applyWORM() 做完的情況
3、確認連結 log 中「"msg":"Find chunk by ID: cu8bso938n801dh1ao70 cu8bso938n801dh1ao7g failed: mongo: no documents in result"」的錯誤起因是什麼

Modify license updater according to the specification adjustments of Surveillance - part 3
description:
New license:

* Surveillance license 資料中要包含可以辨識為surveillance license及天數的資訊

* QVRPro綁定頁面中列出user's "valid" surveillance licenses和channels，並透過list spaces查看各space.sources內的license ID來顯示已綁定過的licenses及channels

* User選擇一license及一channel進行綁定，此時surveillance對mQc storage發出create space request，request內包含要綁定的license ID, permitted_app_ids

* mQc storage會返回建立好的space ID，QVRPro即可開始針對該space進行上傳

 

License upgrade:

* License upgrade的情境下，會產出新的license ID，mQc storage會自動將新的license ID綁定到原有的space上面

* 此時若開啟QVRPro列出licenses和channels的頁面時，原有的license狀態會從valid變成其他非valid的狀態，因此就不會在license list上，只要QVRPro確保實作邏輯是list valid licenses及spaces後比對兩邊有相同license ID即顯示配對，新license就會自動顯示有綁定在原本的space上，無需做額外動作
