summary: As a user, I want the ability to create shared links tailored to my subscription plan, so my sharing capabilities align with the features of "myQNAPcloud Storage" and "myQNAPcloud One.
description:
*Acceptance Criteria:*
 # *Subscription Plan Detection:*
#* The system must detect the user's active subscription plan (myQNAPcloud Storage or myQNAPcloud One) upon login or when attempting to use the "Share" functionality.
# Behavior for *myQNAPcloud Storage* Plan:
#* The "Share" option remains visible even when multiple files or folders are selected.
#* However, if the user attempts to use the "Share" option with multiple selections, a notification or tooltip will appear stating:{code}@Reduce the number of shared items or upgrade to myQNAPcloud One to enable sharing multiple files and folders.@{code}{code}@Upgrade your plan@{code}
 # Behavior for *myQNAPcloud One* Plan:
#* Users can select multiple files and folders to create a shared link in one action.
#* No UI restrictions for multi-selection in the "Share" functionality.
# Default UI Behavior:
#* The *"Share"* option must dynamically respond to the selection state:
#** The Free plan behavior remain unchanged
# Error Handling:
#* If the user's subscription plan changes during a session, frontend should retrieve the license info when refresh the space and update the UI accordingly.
#* API should return error in case user skipped the frontend and try to access via API.

summary: As a user, I would like to have an keep me signed in option while entering QID and password, so I will not be logout frequently
description:
h3. Acceptance Criteria
 # *UI: Checkbox Display*
#* A "Keep me signed in" checkbox is displayed on the QID login page below the password field.
 #* The checkbox is unchecked by default.
#* An info icon displayed at the end, mouse over on icon display the tooltip: \{code}@Extends session duration to 2 days. Not recommended for shared devices.@\{code}
 # *Functionality: Session Duration*
#* If the user checks the "Keep me signed in" checkbox, the session duration is extended to 2 days.
 #* If the checkbox is not checked, the session duration remains the default of 2 hours.
 # *Behavior: Session Persistence*
 #* The extended session remains active even after the browser is closed and reopened, provided it is within the 2-day window.
 #* If the session exceeds 2 days, the user is required to log in again regardless of the checkbox selection.
 # *Security: Multi-Device Login*
 #* The "Keep me signed in" setting is specific to the device and browser where it is selected.
 # *Activity & Logging*
#* Log whether the "Keep me signed in" option was selected during login for troubleshooting purposes.

summary: As a HA user, I would like to activate license using License Key under HA Mode, so I can activate other QID owner's license
description:
h3. *Acceptance Criteria*
h4. *1. Header*
 * *Title:* License Activation - Active and Passive Nodes
 * *Subtitle:* Activate your licenses for both nodes using the same or different license keys.

h4. *2. Content*
 * *Step 1: License Key Input*
 ** Provide fields for entering license keys for both nodes.
 ** Display a checkbox for “Same as Active Node.”
 *** When checked:
 **** Only the Active Node license key is required.
 **** Passive Node input is disabled and mirrors the Active Node’s key.
 *** When unchecked:
 **** Both Active and Passive Node license key inputs are editable.
 ** *Validation:*
 *** Ensure both license keys belong to the same product.
 **** *Error Message:*
 ***** “The License Keys entered do not belong to the same product. Please enter valid keys.”
 *** Ensure entered keys are valid (25 characters) and matches format. 
 * *Step 2: Enter Seat Counts*
 ** *For Unified View (Same as Active Node)*
 *** *Behavior:*
 **** When the “Same as Active Node” checkbox is checked:
 **** The Passive Node seat input is disabled and mirrors the value entered for the Active Node.
 **** Users only enter seat counts for the Active Node.
 **** The Passive Node’s available seats are validated automatically against the Active Node’s input.
 *** *Seat Availability:* Ensure the total seats assigned do not exceed the available seats on either node.
 *** *Minimum Requirement:* Ensure at least 2 total seats (1 per node).
 **** If insufficient seats for both nodes:
 ***** *Message:* “At least 2 seats are required to activate the license on both nodes.”
 ** *For Split View (Different License Keys)*
 *** *Behavior:*
 **** When the “Same as Active Node” checkbox is unchecked:
 **** Both Active Node and Passive Node seat counts are managed independently.
 **** Users can enter separate license keys and adjust seat counts for each node.
 *** *Consistency:* Ensure the Active Node seat count does not exceed the Passive Node’s available seats.
 *** *Error Messages:*
 **** If insufficient seats for Passive Node:
 ***** *Message:* “The Passive Node license has only \{passive_seat_num} seat(s) available. Reduce the seat count for the Active Node.”
 * *Step 3: License Activation*
 ** “Activate” button triggers the license activation process for both nodes.
 ** *Success Message:*
 *** “License successfully activated for Active and Passive Nodes.”
 ** *Failure Handling:*
 *** Display error messages based on specific failure causes (e.g., insufficient seats, invalid keys or app return errors).

----
h3. *Error Handling Summary*
||*Scenario*||*Error Message*||
|Keys Do Not Belong to the Same Product|The License Keys entered do not belong to the same product. Please enter valid keys.|
|Insufficient Seats (Unified View)|At least 2 seats are required to activate the license on both nodes.|
|Insufficient Seats on Passive Node (Split)|The Passive Node license has only \{passive_seat_num} seat(s) available. Reduce the seat count for the Active Node.|

summary: Modify license updater according to the specification adjustments of Surveillance
description:
New license:

* Surveillance license 資料中要包含可以辨識為surveillance license及天數的資訊

* QVRPro綁定頁面中列出user's "valid" surveillance licenses和channels，並透過list spaces查看各space.sources內的license ID來顯示已綁定過的licenses及channels

* User選擇一license及一channel進行綁定，此時surveillance對mQc storage發出create space request，request內包含要綁定的license ID, permitted_app_ids

* mQc storage會返回建立好的space ID，QVRPro即可開始針對該space進行上傳

 

License upgrade:

* License upgrade的情境下，會產出新的license ID，mQc storage會自動將新的license ID綁定到原有的space上面

* 此時若開啟QVRPro列出licenses和channels的頁面時，原有的license狀態會從valid變成其他非valid的狀態，因此就不會在license list上，只要QVRPro確保實作邏輯是list valid licenses及spaces後比對兩邊有相同license ID即顯示配對，新license就會自動顯示有綁定在原本的space上，無需做額外動作

summary: [Q2] Refine prometheus alerts & check OOM issue - part 4
description:
從pr site的資訊看來，目前有幾個記憶體用量比較多的物件：
1. github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go/aws/endpoints.init
-目前s3service裡面都是使用s3.New(sess)，雖然sess是共用的，但是s3 client都是當下才建立出來的，可能會有額外的建立成本，可考慮共用。
（不過共用client可能會造成connection pool也共用，可能需測試或是用flag來設定是否共用）
另外一個可能的方向是，由於call stack看起來是從main進來的，可能不是new client、而是LoadVendors造成的-
先考慮改用：aws-sdk-go-v2 https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2
參考：https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go/issues/3717

2. bytes.growSlice
呼叫的點有：qif-gitlab.dev-myqnapcloud.com/q2/q2-backend/pkg/gen/restapi/operations.NewQ2BackendAPI.JSONProducer.func112
和qwiss的middleware，有可能是因為response body的長度太長，導致會需要另外增加byte slice容量，可研究看看是否有方法可以調大預設容量。

3. github.com/snapcore/go-gettext.ParseMO
呼叫的點是：qif-gitlab.dev-myqnapcloud.com/qcloud/qlib/qtranslate.N_
可能需檢查是否可以最佳化翻譯的部分。

summary: As a QNAP user,   I want to transfer a QNAP device from my QID usage to org usage directly through the Portal,  so that the device can be managed under my organization without needing to initiate the transfer from the device - Part3
description:
_Acceptance Criteria:_
 * *Transfer Process:*
 ** Upon initiating the transfer from the Portal, an Org Token is generated and stored, which can only bind to the specified organization.
 ** The device rebinds to the organization upon its next heartbeat, using the Org Token (which must have device.bind permission).
 ** If the device receives updates via API calls before rebind, the original QID Token remains valid until the rebind is successful.
 ** After rebind, the device ID remains the same, and the user is prompted to assign the device to a Site or default to My Site.
 * *Access Control:*
 ** Clear the existing Access Control list.
 ** Switch the device to Specific Admin mode, accessible only by the Org Owner and Site Admin.
 * *SSL Certificate:*
 ** If using Let's Encrypt, the SSL certificate remains valid or a new one can be imported.
 ** If using TWCA:
 *** For QTS 5.1.0 and above, the certificate remains valid as long as License Center is installed.
 *** For QTS 5.1.0 and below or myQNAPcloud Portal purchases, the certificate is released since it doesn’t support organization usage.
 * *Notification:*
 ** A notification is sent to AMIZcloud/myQNAPcloud with the message: "Device \{device_name} has transferred from personal QNAP Account (a***g@qnap.com)."
 * *Friend's Device:*
 ** Remove the device from any Friend's Device lists where it was previously added.

----
_Common Tasks for Both Scenarios_
 * *AMIZcloud Data Handling:*
 ** The user is prompted to decide whether to clear or retain historical data (CPU/Memory/Storage Pool Usage/Volume Usage Trend/Enclosure Temperature, Fan Speed, Performance metrics, and Event Logs) collected by AMIZcloud Agent.
 * *DDNS:*
 ** DDNS settings are retained, and internal/external port modifications are detected and reported using the original token.
 * *myQNAPcloud Link:*
 ** CloudLink tunnel ID/Connection settings are retained.
 * *License Management:*
 ** The AMIZcloud Portal prompts the user to manually deactivate any licenses in License Center if they no longer apply, as license ownership and usage can differ between the owner and user.

summary: Add API to Temporarily Store Client Public IPs

description:
原本 worker 的程式碼：
https://sauron.qnap.com/cec-sw1/qcloud/api/-/blob/develop/src/python/qnap/ddns/task.py

整個流程大約是：
1、nas 打 qcloud ddns API
2、ddns API 會更新資料到 mongo db 接著 produce message 到 rabbitMQ
3、worker (上述 task.py) 裡的 rabbitMQ consumer 會收到 message (會是 pickle 格式，裡面固定會給 device_id)
4、worker 就會去 mongo db query by device_id 撈出該筆完整 data
5、worker 去 mysql db 裡更新 data (by device_id)

目標是把它拆出來重寫成一個獨立的 worker，使用的語言不限。(python3 or golang 都行)

summary: As a user, I want the Zero Trust IP Registration feature to handle environments with both IPv4 and IPv6, as well as Dual WAN setups, ensuring consistent and accurate IP registration to avoid access issues.
description:
Acceptance Criteria
* Frontend
** UI Display:
*** The UI must display both the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses retrieved from the user's browser.
*** If the environment has Dual WAN, up to two IPv4 and two IPv6 addresses should be displayed.
** Token Generation:
*** The frontend must generate a unique token when retrieving the user's IP addresses.
*** The token must be included in all subsequent requests related to the current registration session.
** IP Address Retrieval:
*** The frontend should send two separate requests to retrieve both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses (e.g., using WebRTC or a similar approach).
*** For Dual WAN setups, the frontend should issue multiple requests and collect all available IPs.
** User Interaction:
*** When the user clicks "Register," the selected token and the associated IP addresses should be sent to the backend for validation and registration.
*Backend
** Token Validation:
*** The backend must validate the token and retrieve the associated IPv4 and IPv6 addresses stored during the initial request.
** IP Registration:
*** The backend must register all valid IP addresses (both IPv4 and IPv6) with QuFirewall.
If Dual WAN is detected, register all retrieved IPs (up to 4: 2 IPv4 + 2 IPv6).
** Error Handling:
*** If the token is missing or invalid, reject the registration request and return an appropriate error message.
*** If no IP addresses are retrieved from the frontend or stored in the backend, return an error indicating the issue.
** Security Checks:
*** Ensure that the token is only valid for a limited time (e.g., 5 minutes) and cannot be reused.
*** Cross-check the token and IP addresses to ensure they were retrieved from the same session.

summary: [Q2] Design a refactor to improve APIs performance
description:
目前發現在 GetSharedObjPerm() 及 GetSharedObjsPerm() 裡面都會做 getPermsByActorAndSharedObjID()，而 getPermsByActorAndSharedObjID() 內部其實就會：
1、撈出此 obj 的所有 parent objs (by FindObjParentsByIDs)
2、承1，再撈出整個路徑上的 objSharings (by FindByAccessMembersAndObjIDsAndStatuses)

而這兩個資料在處理 sharing 相關的 APIs 時幾乎都會用到，且在目前流程上會是在各個相關的函式裡被再次做 dao 來取得全部或部分相同的資料。

所以覺得可以從這裡下手來優化效能。
暫時想到的方案有：

-------------
*[方案 A] 調整 ObjPerm struct*
把 ObjPerm struct 改成如下 (多了最後兩個 item)：
{code}
type ObjPerm struct {
	perms     []AccessMemberPerm
	expiresAt *time.Time
	obj       *Object
	space     *Space
	parentObjs       []*Object
	objSharings       []*ObjSharings
}
{code}

再新增兩個 methods:
{code}
func (p *ObjPerm) GetParentObjs() []*Object
func (p *ObjPerm) GetObjSharings() []*ObjSharing
{code}
(其中也可以考慮把原本 getPermsByActorAndSharedObjID() 裡面去取得 parent objs 及 obj sharings 的實作移到這兩個新的 methods 中)

最後把相關需要用到 parent objs 或 obj sharings 的函式新增參數，或是直接改帶入 objPerm 進去，好讓相關函式能減少重複的 dao。

-------------
*[方案 B] 新增 global data 暫存*

概念上是在整個 service 弄一個 map[string]any 當暫存，讓每個進來的 request 自行把有做 dao 的資料暫時放在 map 裡，好讓該 request 後續的流程裡可以透過 map 來取得相關曾經做過 dao 的資料。最後 request response 前再去把 map 裡的相關暫存清掉。

或是在 handler 層開始 new 一個 map[string]any 當暫存，然後後面流程一直把這個 map 往後傳。往後面流程傳的方式可以是直接在函式新增 map[string]any 參數，或是把 map 放到 context 裡

As a user, I want to recover licenses on my device under HA Mode, so I can ensure proper licensing without manual activation
description:
* Acceptance Criteria:
** Clicking the "Recover License" option in the License Center sends a request to the License Server using the device's Hardware Serial Number (HWSN) and Firmware Serial Number (SUID).
** If any licenses match the provided HWSN and SUID but are not activated on the current device, the system will automatically activate those licenses.
** In HA mode:
*** Licenses tied to the HWSN and SUID of both the Active Node and Passive Node will be recovered.
*** Recovered licenses will be displayed under the respective tabs (Active Node and Passive Node).
** License Center will notify the user about the licenses has been successfully recovered.
*** {code}Total Recovered Licenses:
Active Node: {active_count}
Passive Node: {passive_count}
The recovered licenses have been successfully applied.
Review the Active Node License and Passive Node License tabs to verify the licenses restored to both nodes.{code}
** If no licenses match the provided information, an appropriate message is displayed (same as previous message).
* Error Handling:
** Mismatch Detected During Recovery:
**# Scenario: Active Node recovered more licenses than the Passive Node.
**#* Action:
**#** Pop-up a dialog: {code}Total Recovered Licenses:
Active Node: {active_count}
Passive Node: {passive_count}
The license recovery process completed, but the Passive Node did not recover all the licenses restored on the Active Node.{code}
**#** Display the "Mismatch" status in the License tab of the Active Node.
**#** Include a tooltip or info icon next to "Mismatch" to guide the user to check the recovery status on the Passive Node.
**#** Provide the Activate on Passive Node icon for user to recover or activate the missing licenses manually for the Passive Node.
** Licenses Activated Only on Passive Node:
**# Scenario: Passive Node recovered more licenses than the Active Node.
**#* Action:
**#** Passive Node's License tab will display all activated licenses.
**#** In the Action column, only the "Deactivate" option is available for these licenses.
**#** Pop-up a dialog when user clicked on Passive Node License and detect extra license:
**#** Warning dialog: {code}Total Recovered Licenses:
Active Node: {active_count}
Passive Node: {passive_count}
Licenses on the Passive Node do not match the Active Node. Please deactivate the extra licenses on the Passive Node and reactivate the matching licenses starting from the Active Node to ensure proper HA functionality.{code}

As an org owner, I want to transfer a QNAP device from organization usage to my QID usage directly through the Portal, so I can manage the device under my personal account without needing to initiate the transfer from the device - Part 2
description:
_Acceptance Criteria:_
 * *Transfer Process:*
 ** Upon initiating the transfer from the Portal, a QID Token is generated and stored, which can only bind to the requesting QID (must be the Org Owner).
 ** The device rebinds to the personal QID upon its next heartbeat, using the QID Token.
 ** If the device receives updates via API calls before rebind, the original Org Token remains valid until the rebind is successful.
 ** After rebind, the device ID remains the same, but it no longer has Site info.
 * *Access Control:*
 ** Clear the existing Access Control list.
 ** Switch the device to Private Mode, accessible only by the device owner.
 * *SSL Certificate:*
 ** If using Let's Encrypt, the SSL certificate remains valid.
 ** If using TWCA (QTS 5.1.0 and above), the certificate remains valid as long as License Center is installed.
 * *Notification:*
 ** A notification is sent to AMIZcloud/myQNAPcloud with the message: "Device \{device_name} has transferred to personal QNAP Account (a***g@qnap.com)."
 * *AMIZcloud Agent:*
 ** AMIZcloud Agent continues to report data using the same Device ID.

_Common Tasks for Both Scenarios_
 * *AMIZcloud Data Handling:*
 ** The user is prompted to decide whether to clear or retain historical data (CPU/Memory/Storage Pool Usage/Volume Usage Trend/Enclosure Temperature, Fan Speed, Performance metrics, and Event Logs) collected by AMIZcloud Agent.
 * *DDNS:*
 ** DDNS settings are retained, and internal/external port modifications are detected and reported using the original token.
 * *myQNAPcloud Link:*
 ** CloudLink tunnel ID/Connection settings are retained.
 * *License Management:*
 ** The Portal prompts the user to manually deactivate any licenses in License Center if they no longer apply, as license ownership and usage can differ between the owner and user.

As a myQNAPcloud One user, I would like to access myQNAPcloud Object service, so I can directly access via portal or S3 API - part 8
description:
Once the user has purchased the myQNAPcloud One subscription plan:
# Q2 Service should received a webhook from License Server indicated the purchase is completed
#* app_internal_name: q2
#* variant_feature: full
#* Other attributes should be similar with Q2 Storage
# Generate a license record associate with the License Server
# Create a *Sub-Account* for this QID
#* Name: Same as QID Display Name
#* Organization Name: The hash vaule(base64) of user_id+region
#* Email: Same as QID Email
#* Wasabi Console Password: A temporary password that will NOT leak to anyone
#* (x) Send Password Reset To Sub Account Email
#* (x) Password Reset Required
#* (x) Enable FTP Access
#* (x) On Trial
#* Set the Purchased Storage same as the subscription plan(50GB/500GB/1TB/2TB/5TB/10TB/20TB/50TB/100TB)
#* Setup using SAML protocol 
# Set the *Regions*
#* Only enable the purchased region based on the Software Store purchased plan
# Set *Access Permission* as "Full Access"
# Enable *SSO (Single Sign On)* option for this member
#* Organization Name: Same as QID email
#* Complete the SAML Connection required data

{code}
PATCH /v1/object/{object_id}/share
PATCH /v1/shared/object/{object_id}/share
{code}

假設目前 obj 路徑為： /A/B/C/D/E/

目前發現 PATCH objSharings API 支援的 op="clone" 彈性有點過大，它會允許當我們對 obj C 做 PATCH sharing 時能夠帶 D 或 E 的 objSharing IDs。
雖然從 clone 這個字眼上來看目前的行為並沒有問題，但這樣的結果並非我們真正想達到的。

所以我們新增了 op="inherit" 的選項並且限縮了範圍，以達到對 obj C 做 op="inherit" 時會只允許帶 A 或 B 的 objSharing IDs，並且不再接受帶入 C 或 D 的 objSharing IDs。

至於原本的 op="clone" 會暫時保留，且行為會變成跟 op="inherit" 一樣。
之後等前端全面改用 op="inherit" 並上版後，後端就會不再支援 op="clone"。

summary: [Q2] Refine prometheus alerts & check OOM issue - part 3
description:
從pr site的資訊看來，目前有幾個記憶體用量比較多的物件：
1. github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go/aws/endpoints.init
-目前s3service裡面都是使用s3.New(sess)，雖然sess是共用的，但是s3 client都是當下才建立出來的，可能會有額外的建立成本，可考慮共用。
（不過共用client可能會造成connection pool也共用，可能需測試或是用flag來設定是否共用）
另外一個可能的方向是，由於call stack看起來是從main進來的，可能不是new client、而是LoadVendors造成的-
先考慮改用：aws-sdk-go-v2 https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2
參考：https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go/issues/3717

2. bytes.growSlice
呼叫的點有：qif-gitlab.dev-myqnapcloud.com/q2/q2-backend/pkg/gen/restapi/operations.NewQ2BackendAPI.JSONProducer.func112
和qwiss的middleware，有可能是因為response body的長度太長，導致會需要另外增加byte slice容量，可研究看看是否有方法可以調大預設容量。

3. github.com/snapcore/go-gettext.ParseMO
呼叫的點是：qif-gitlab.dev-myqnapcloud.com/qcloud/qlib/qtranslate.N_
可能需檢查是否可以最佳化翻譯的部分。

summary: [Qmiix] 確認什麼情況下會出現下列狀況
Update myQNAPcloud Portal CSS style for device SVG image

description:
{code} parent0/                      --> user2 can write + expires in 2 days
  └── parent1/
       └── parent2/            --> user2 can read + no expires
            └── parent3/
                 └── parent4/  --> anyone can write, none qid can write, expires in 2 days
                      └── parent5/
{code}

當使用 user2 身份去打 PATCH /v1/shared/object/parent4/share 來嘗式調整 anyone 的 objSharing 時，預期要無法修改，但實測時卻能成功修改...。

預期上此時 user2 要吃到 parent2 的 users objSharing，所以只會有 read 權限。
但實測下此時 user2 卻是吃到了 parent4 的 anyone objSharing 權限，導致有 write 權限，而這是不預期中該發生的。

之前在 qcloud 上有能夠上傳、取得、刪除 avatar 的 APIs，相關文件:
https://core.api.alpha-myqnapcloud.com/devdoc/apidoc/qcloud_api_1_2.html#!/device_avatar
{code}
POST /v1.2/device/{device id}/avatar
GET /v1.2/device/{device id}/avatar
DELETE /v1.2/device/{device id}/avatar
{code}

而 avatar APIs 目前已被拿掉了，因為：
1、相關的 python package 有 security issue
2、avatar APIs 沒什麼人在用

但後來發現該 API 還是有人會用到，所以打算改用 golang 寫一個新的 avatar APIs。
下面是當初移掉上述這三支 APIs 的commit 資訊：
https://sauron.qnap.com/cec-sw1/qcloud/api/-/commit/0504d8976b480104cf5b9e44569d07d7ae48232b

可以參考當時的邏輯來實作新的 avatar APIs

As a user, I would like the system to automatically deactivate a license on the Passive Node when I deactivate it on the Active Node, so the license states remain synchronized.
description:
* Acceptance Criteria with Detailed Steps:
# User selects a license on the Active Node and clicks "Deactivate" icon under Action column. 
# License Center prompts the user with the same deactivate dialog:
#* Choosing Deactivation Method:
#*# Deactivate using QID
#*# Offline Deactivation
#*# A Warning description display at the lower section: {code}"Deactivating this license on the Active Node will also deactivate it on the Passive Node. Do you wish to continue?{code}
# User confirms deactivation.
# License Center deactivates the license on both nodes.
# System displays a success message: {code}License successfully deactivated on Active and Passive Nodes.{code}

summary: As a user, I would like to activate a license on the Passive Node based on the existing license configuration on the Active Node, so my HA environment remains consistent.
description:
* Acceptance Criteria with Detailed Steps:
# When a mismatch is detected, License Center displays an "Activate on Passive Node" icon for the license under Action column in the Active Node's tab.
# User clicks the "Activate on Passive Node" icon.
# License Center opens an activation wizard, filtering available licenses to show only those compatible with the Active Node's license.
#* Product type will be focused as the same type chosen from Active Node, and unable to change it.
#* Only displayed the filtered licenses. 
#** *Filter Condition:*
#**# Product Type
#**# Available Seats >= Seats Activated on Active Node
# User selects the matching license and seat quantity(Auto Fill-in) for the Passive Node.
# User click the Activate button
# System completes the activation and updates the license status across both nodes.

summary: As a user, I would like to activate licenses on both the Active and Passive Nodes, so my HA environment remains consistent and functional.
description:
Acceptance Criteria with Detailed Steps:
# User clicks the "+ Activate License" button in the License Center.
# License Center opens an activation wizard and prompts the user to select a license and its seat quantity for the Active Node.
#* Under HA Management Mode, license selection will be changed from checkbox to radio button to avoid the complexity. 
# After selecting the license, clicking the Next button will prompts the user to select the same license for the Passive Node.
#* License Center only displays matching license options to prevent inconsistencies.
#* The Product dropdown list will be disabled and filtered product matches the Active Node's product
#* The available seats MUST be greater than the user activated seats on Active Node. Otherwise, it will be filtered. 
#* If user activate multi-seat during the Active Node, the seat number for the passive node will automatically filled in. 
# User completes the activation process by confirming the license and seat selections for both nodes.
# System activates the licenses on both nodes and displays a success message: {code}Licenses successfully activated for Active and Passive Nodes.{code}

summary: As a user, I would like to view a comparison of licenses between the Active and Passive Nodes, so I can identify any mismatches or discrepancies.
description:
*Acceptance Criteria with Detailed Steps:
# User navigates to the License Center and selects the "HA Licenses" view.
# License Center displays two tabs: "Active Node Licenses" and "Passive Node Licenses."
# User can switch between tabs to view the licenses installed on each node.
# If there is a license mismatch between nodes, the Status displays the *Mismatch*.
#* Mismatch Detection: 
#** Compare licenses between Active and Passive Nodes (license type, seat count).
# User can mouseover on the question icon(?) to view detailed information about the license difference: {code}The licenses or seat quantities on the Active and Passive Nodes do not match.{code}

summary: As a QNAP user,   I want to transfer a QNAP device from my QID usage to org usage directly through the Portal,  so that the device can be managed under my organization without needing to initiate the transfer from the device - FE
description:
_Acceptance Criteria:_
 * *Transfer Process:*
 ** Upon initiating the transfer from the Portal, an Org Token is generated and stored, which can only bind to the specified organization.
 ** The device rebinds to the organization upon its next heartbeat, using the Org Token (which must have device.bind permission).
 ** If the device receives updates via API calls before rebind, the original QID Token remains valid until the rebind is successful.
 ** After rebind, the device ID remains the same, and the user is prompted to assign the device to a Site or default to My Site.
 * *Access Control:*
 ** Clear the existing Access Control list.
 ** Switch the device to Specific Admin mode, accessible only by the Org Owner and Site Admin.
 * *SSL Certificate:*
 ** If using Let's Encrypt, the SSL certificate remains valid or a new one can be imported.
 ** If using TWCA:
 *** For QTS 5.1.0 and above, the certificate remains valid as long as License Center is installed.
 *** For QTS 5.1.0 and below or myQNAPcloud Portal purchases, the certificate is released since it doesn’t support organization usage.
 * *Notification:*
 ** A notification is sent to AMIZcloud/myQNAPcloud with the message: "Device \{device_name} has transferred from personal QNAP Account (a***g@qnap.com)."
 * *Friend's Device:*
 ** Remove the device from any Friend's Device lists where it was previously added.

----
_Common Tasks for Both Scenarios_
 * *AMIZcloud Data Handling:*
 ** The user is prompted to decide whether to clear or retain historical data (CPU/Memory/Storage Pool Usage/Volume Usage Trend/Enclosure Temperature, Fan Speed, Performance metrics, and Event Logs) collected by AMIZcloud Agent.
 * *DDNS:*
 ** DDNS settings are retained, and internal/external port modifications are detected and reported using the original token.
 * *myQNAPcloud Link:*
 ** CloudLink tunnel ID/Connection settings are retained.
 * *License Management:*
 ** The AMIZcloud Portal prompts the user to manually deactivate any licenses in License Center if they no longer apply, as license ownership and usage can differ between the owner and user.

summary: Allow Software Store to send distributor_contact while creating License or Pre-Gen License
description:
Disty 想要在賣出給客戶之後，user 啟用授權並且使用到快到期的時候，也可以收到通知，進而可以去提醒自己的客戶要去做延展了。
 
這塊需要要在Disty/ Sales 進單的時候就要有這個欄位，然後一直往後帶到打給我Create License這邊，我要把他壓上 License Info 裡面。

發信到期信的時候，如果有發現License裡面有這個欄位，就會一起將信件發送出去給這個distributor_contact 的 email 位置

[pre-condition]
Owner 分享同檔案給指定 qidA write + 有指定期限

[steps]
以 qidA 的身分去 edit 該 sharing 並從 share to qid only 改成 share to anyone

情況1：把 anyone 的到期日從 off 調成 on 並按下 save
Actual result：此時 portal 因為會嘗試建立一個無期限的 sharing，所以會被 backend 拒絕
Expect result：可能需要與 PM 討論來確定

情況2：把 anyone 的到期日從 on 調成 off
此時 portal 會提示：「您確定要刪除到期日嗎？該連結將無限期保持活動狀態。」
Expect result：可能需要與 PM 討論來確定。因為實際上 qidA 對該檔案是無法建出無期限的 sharing，所以這句描述「該連結將無限期保持活動狀態」似乎不太正確。

summary: [Qmiix] Upgrade Facebook SDK version used in channel app
description:
Your App, Qmiix, currently has access to Graph API v15.0 which will reach the end of its 2-year lifetime on 20 November, 2024. To ensure a smooth transition, please migrate all calls to Graph API v16.0 or higher. Use the API Upgrade Tool to understand exactly how this change will impact your app.

Note: If you do not see any impacted calls in the API Upgrade Tool, your app/code may not be affected by this upgrade.

Visit our changelog to see the full list of changes in all Graph API versions.

summary: Support new Project Context in Qanalytic CLI
description:
|qproduct_build_year	|text (VARCHAR(255))	|NAS 出廠年份 (在地端用 hwsn 先算出來)|	2024|
|qproduct_hash_hwsn	|text (VARCHAR(255))	|由NAS的硬體序號合併後計算出的MD5	| |

會議中討論，目前無法知道機器出廠年份，所以不知道每年賣出多少台機器與他們的活動數量
* build year 可以使用 hwsn 去算出來
** hwsn 分成兩種，一種是舊款的(e.g. Q118B05339)
*** 取 第三跟第四碼為年份（e.g. 18 = 2018)
** 新規的 hwsn 會把前面打成都打成亂碼，Sam 會去跟工廠取得怎麼反轉回去的方式
*** Local CLI 在打資料上去之前就已經完成反轉，並且把機器生產年份報上
* hasn_hwsn 因為目前使用的 digest 重複率有點高，不確定是什麼原因，所以希望直接拿 hwsn 的 hash 來當辨識。
** 有提過 hwsn 有可能會發生很多台會是一樣的問題，但是會議上決定，如果真的出現就濾掉，不把這個 hash 納入計算標準

#* app_internal_name: q2
#* variant_feature: full
#* Other attributes should be similar with Q2 Storage
# Generate a license record associate with the License Server
# Create a *Sub-Account* for this QID
#* Name: Same as QID Display Name
#* Organization Name: The hash vaule(base64) of user_id+region
#* Email: Same as QID Email
#* Wasabi Console Password: A temporary password that will NOT leak to anyone
#* (x) Send Password Reset To Sub Account Email
#* (x) Password Reset Required
#* (x) Enable FTP Access
#* (x) On Trial
#* Set the Purchased Storage same as the subscription plan(50GB/500GB/1TB/2TB/5TB/10TB/20TB/50TB/100TB)
#* Setup using SAML protocol 
# Set the *Regions*
#* Only enable the purchased region based on the Software Store purchased plan
# Set *Access Permission* as "Full Access"
# Enable *SSO (Single Sign On)* option for this member
#* Organization Name: Same as QID email
#* Complete the SAML Connection required data

summary: [Qmiix] Test channel apps that interacted with NC - part2
description:
需要簡單測一下會跟 NC 串接到的 Channel apps，並同時要測一下該 channel app 分別在 dev/alpha/pr site 的情況。
目前先列出的五個 channel apps 為之前 QTSNTFC0-1745 裡面有特別點名到的。

因為 ACC 在 get access token 的 API 已不再支援非標準的把參數放在 url 裡的方式，導致使用 qlib 裡的 GetToken() 的程式基本上都掛了。

所以 Qmiix 大部分的元件都因此而噴錯，需要一個個的修復。

1. Owner 在編輯分享時，無法把別人的權限從 write 改成 read
2. Owner share to anyone 及 QidA (write) 時，QidA 去編輯該分享時，畫面會錯誤顯成 share to QID only

description:
chunk to vendor: 159421
再次get prefix by key，並確認vendor key真的不存在，
如果key存在，則印出來但不需處理。
如果key不存在，再次確認是否chunk真的不存在，
如果chunk不存在，則印出來但不需處理。
如果chunk存在，檢查有哪些object有使用到這些chunk。
沒有被object使用到的chunk應該可以刪除。
（手動處理）如果有被object使用到的chunk，看是否可以找到其他chunk來更新。

vendor to chunk: 8866
依照不同region分開
再次檢查是否不存在chunk db，如果存在，則印出來（後續可能需debug原程式），
如果不存在，則加入delete list，最後印出來後、再一次刪除。

summary: [Storage Service] Support QLSM to Check Duplicate and Increment Count
Response updated updated_at while getting expired license with valid status
description:
在打get license相關的api時

license server有一邏輯是：若get時發現license已經過期但status仍為valid時，會將status改成expired並response

但該license的updated_at仍維持在更新前的時間

由於q2之前有一情境會需要正確的updated_at

就有因為拿到錯誤的更新時間而產生bug

因此license server這邊應該要在response更改後狀態時同時也要response更改後的updated_at

列出 backend 相關改動：
-----------
{code}
    PATCH /v1/object/{object id}/share
    PATCH /v1/shared/object/{object id}/share
{code}
1. 預期希望在 PATCH 時，client 只帶有改動的人到 request body 裡
2. 這兩支 API 目前改成 body 裡 item array 中的每個 item 都必須帶 "op" 這個新欄位，值有 "update" 跟 "clone" 兩種
3. 當有改動的人的 obj_sharing 其實是因為繼承 parent 的情況時，就是使用 op=clone 的情境。此時 item 裡的 obj_sharing_id 要帶 parent 的 obj_sharing id

-----------
{code}
    GET /v1/shared_link/{shared_link_id}
{code}
Modified behavior to:
1. 當 client 帶了個不存在的 link id 時，會回 http 404
2. 當 link 被指定需要登入而 client 卻未登入任意 QID 時，會回 http 403
3. 當 client 使用的 access token 無法存取該 link 下的全部 objects 時，會回 http 403

summary: BE - Modify link response with different error codes
Enhance the mQc Storage sharing mechanism by calling different APIs for creating/editing/deleting members - part2
Refactor code to use new Azure Blob SDK
description:
[azure]
官方已經不再推薦使用 github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go/azblob 這個 SDK 了。根據搜索結果:
github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go/azblob 這個庫已經被棄用，並將在 2024 年 9 月 13 日退役。官方建議在那之前使用新的 SDK github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/storage/azblob 來替換。
新舊 SDK 之間存在一些不兼容的變化，不能做到完全無縫遷移。需要修改一些代碼才能適配新的 SDK。
新的 github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/storage/azblob 提供了更新的 API，使用方式也有所不同。比如現在是每個 blob 都有一個單獨的客戶端，而不是整個生命週期共用一個單例客戶端。
所以我建議你儘快將代碼遷移到新的 SDK github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/storage/azblob。雖然需要修改一些代碼，但官方已經明確棄用了舊的 SDK，遲早都要遷移。遷移指南在 https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/blob/main/sdk/storage/azblob/migrationguide.md ，可以參考一下。


在解決 qlib GetToken() 問題時，因為對它做了 go mod tidy，所以有動到：
{code}
-       github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go v0.10.0
+       github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go v0.15.0
{code}
然後這段會造成有些物件找不到而 build fail

因為 ACC 在 get access token 的 API 已不再支援非標準的把參數放在 url 裡的方式，導致使用 qlib 裡的 GetToken() 的程式基本上都掛了。

所以 Qmiix 大部分的元件都因此而噴錯，需要一個個的修復。

Compare the Chunk ID between Wasabi and Q2 Storage to check if both are consistent - part 5
description:
chunk to vendor: 159421
再次get prefix by key，並確認vendor key真的不存在，
如果key存在，則印出來但不需處理。
如果key不存在，再次確認是否chunk真的不存在，
如果chunk不存在，則印出來但不需處理。
如果chunk存在，檢查有哪些object有使用到這些chunk。
沒有被object使用到的chunk應該可以刪除。
（手動處理）如果有被object使用到的chunk，看是否可以找到其他chunk來更新。

vendor to chunk: 8866
依照不同region分開
再次檢查是否不存在chunk db，如果存在，則印出來（後續可能需debug原程式），
如果不存在，則加入delete list，最後印出來後、再一次刪除。

alpha 是 "scopeset_qmiix_push" : {},

description:
Request URL:
https://q2.alpha.myqnapcloud.io/v1/shared_link/random_url?object_ids=cpcicoabdulc73e2bqq0
Request Method:
GET
Status Code:
404 Not Found

Response
{"code":"common_resource_not_found","message":"Invalid objIDs"}

---
[Reproduce steps]
{color:#DE350B}alpha site{color}，在 shared with me 頁面，打開任一 object 的編輯 share 頁頁後，複制分享連結後，在別的分頁使用該分享連結時會噴上述 error。

---
Backend 分析：
url 後面的 object_ids 是要接 object 的 IDs，但當時 alpha site 上實際卻是帶了 obj_sharing 的 ID 才導致錯誤

其中 google-text-to-speech 在 go sast 時目前會 fail，簡單看了一下可能跟引用的 go module 有關，不過麻煩的是該 module 已不再維護、需要換成另一個：
https://github.com/googleapis/google-cloud-go/

最終討論後，因為 google stt/tts/translate channel apps 其實都還沒上 pr site，所以就先不管它了

因為 ACC 在 get access token 的 API 已不再支援非標準的把參數放在 url 裡的方式，導致使用 qlib 裡的 GetToken() 的程式基本上都掛了。

所以 Qmiix 大部分的元件都因此而噴錯，需要一個個的修復。

summary: Adjust the Organization Center UI based on consistent policy made by DC Team
Adjust the Account Center UI based on consistent policy made by DC Team
Create test cases for Personal Vault - Part2
[Q2] Support to add/update/delete objSharings with a single API call
description:
關於 objSharings 資料的處理，現況：
1、新增只能靠 POST /v1/shared/object/share
2、修改只能靠 PATCH /v1/shared/object/\{object id\}/share
3、刪除只能靠 DELETE /v1/shared/object/\{object id\}/share

--
而如果 user 在 edit sharing 時，從 UI 上依順做了以下的動作時，就需要把上面的 API 各打一次：
1、從 share to anyone 改成 share to QID only
2、輸入新的 qid
3、修改既有的 qid 的權限

--
有鑑於此，為了減少 API 的呼叫，我們會調整 PATCH /v1/shared/object/\{object id\}/share，讓它能同時新增、修改及刪除 objSharings。
大方向的改動是：
1、以原本 PATCH 的 request body 做擴充，每個 item 會新增一個欄位叫 op，其值有三種：add、update、delete
2、obj_sharing_id 一樣是必填
3、在新增時，前端需要去判斷當 list obj with obj_sharing_info=true 拿到的 objSharing 沒有 id 時，前端要自行去爬該 objSharing 的 parent_sharings 裡的第一個 item 的 id 來填在 obj_sharing_id，而後端會把該 obj sharing clone 並壓上前端帶的 perm 及把 _id 新 new 一個來 insert to db
4、在修改時，obj_sharing_id 的 objSharing.ObjID 要跟 url path 的 object id 一致，不一致就噴錯
5、刪除 case 暫不處理。因為這牽扯到如果要刪的對象的 objSharing 是繼承來的時，就可能需要走確認 user 是否真的想 unshare 的流程。而經過討論後確認了 DELETE case 原本的做法即可，所以 PATCH 就暫時先不增加刪除的功能。

summary: Change SDK for azure channel app
description:
[azure]
官方已經不再推薦使用 github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go/azblob 這個 SDK 了。根據搜索結果:
github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go/azblob 這個庫已經被棄用，並將在 2024 年 9 月 13 日退役。官方建議在那之前使用新的 SDK github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/storage/azblob 來替換。
新舊 SDK 之間存在一些不兼容的變化，不能做到完全無縫遷移。需要修改一些代碼才能適配新的 SDK。
新的 github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/storage/azblob 提供了更新的 API，使用方式也有所不同。比如現在是每個 blob 都有一個單獨的客戶端，而不是整個生命週期共用一個單例客戶端。
所以我建議你儘快將代碼遷移到新的 SDK github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/storage/azblob。雖然需要修改一些代碼，但官方已經明確棄用了舊的 SDK，遲早都要遷移。遷移指南在 https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/blob/main/sdk/storage/azblob/migrationguide.md ，可以參考一下。


在解決 qlib GetToken() 問題時，因為對它做了 go mod tidy，所以有動到：
{code}
-       github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go v0.10.0
+       github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go v0.15.0
{code}
然後這段會造成有些物件找不到而 build fail

summary: [Q2] Fix activity log issue if deletion requests come rapidly
description:
研究一下下面這兩個trace ID的Issue是什麼狀況好嗎？他們都是在user delete後要記activity log在query deleted object's parent的時候說找不到，我怕是activity log那邊有什麼bug，想說可以稍微看一下
9af569ef31580a0afea774f965c3f83d
d93b28b0ebea078d00a983656cd73e6b

還有這個 trace，也是有點可怕，是在complete時要apply WORM，一樣是在找parents的時候找不到
1195e91a51bc27ecd8bbc5f1d83439f0

我初步懷疑兩個方向
一個是secondary的問題
第二個是針對deleted objects，在猜會不會query parents的某些流程是會需要object本體存在，但因為delete掉了導致無法繼續往下找
不過都是猜的，不確定真實情況

還有一種可能是，真的同時有別的process在run，然後是刪除該object的某個parent，所以parent真的被delete了才找不到，這也是有可能

想想activity log是3的機率好像很高，如果在delete一個深度folder，如果每個sub folder內檔案都很少，就很容易很快就砍完objects然後砍掉folder，那對objects的activity log來說，就是還來不及紀錄，parent就被刪掉了

所以有可能解決方式會變成delete的case的activity log要特例，不能用go routine

 

更新：

1.HBS/CacheMount會在呼叫一個object的complete upload後，不到一秒的時間內呼叫delete，導致apploy WORM失敗。目前推測是使用者手動操作，不進行處理
2.HBS/CacheMount在刪除一個包含檔案a的folder x時，目前會先呼叫DELETE a api，將x清空後，再呼叫DELETE x api，應該是以DFS方式進行刪除。問題發生的原因是原本插入activity log部分是用go routine處理，由於x很快也被刪除，導致找不到a的parent，進而使得插入插入activity log的動作失敗。目前處理方式是拿掉go routine，但也看後續HBS/CacheMount是否直接呼叫DELETE x api就好

summary: 調整 AMIZcloud Device Status API 的 Response 顯示

As a QNAP user,   I want to transfer a QNAP device from my QID usage to org usage directly through the Portal,  so that the device can be managed under my organization without needing to initiate the transfer from the device
description:
_Acceptance Criteria:_
 * *Transfer Process:*
 ** Upon initiating the transfer from the Portal, an Org Token is generated and stored, which can only bind to the specified organization.
 ** The device rebinds to the organization upon its next heartbeat, using the Org Token (which must have device.bind permission).
 ** If the device receives updates via API calls before rebind, the original QID Token remains valid until the rebind is successful.
 ** After rebind, the device ID remains the same, and the user is prompted to assign the device to a Site or default to My Site.
 * *Access Control:*
 ** Clear the existing Access Control list.
 ** Switch the device to Specific Admin mode, accessible only by the Org Owner and Site Admin.
 * *SSL Certificate:*
 ** If using Let's Encrypt, the SSL certificate remains valid or a new one can be imported.
 ** If using TWCA:
 *** For QTS 5.1.0 and above, the certificate remains valid as long as License Center is installed.
 *** For QTS 5.1.0 and below or myQNAPcloud Portal purchases, the certificate is released since it doesn’t support organization usage.
 * *Notification:*
 ** A notification is sent to AMIZcloud/myQNAPcloud with the message: "Device \{device_name} has transferred from personal QNAP Account (a***g@qnap.com)."
 * *Friend's Device:*
 ** Remove the device from any Friend's Device lists where it was previously added.

----
_Common Tasks for Both Scenarios_
 * *AMIZcloud Data Handling:*
 ** The user is prompted to decide whether to clear or retain historical data (CPU/Memory/Storage Pool Usage/Volume Usage Trend/Enclosure Temperature, Fan Speed, Performance metrics, and Event Logs) collected by AMIZcloud Agent.
 * *DDNS:*
 ** DDNS settings are retained, and internal/external port modifications are detected and reported using the original token.
 * *myQNAPcloud Link:*
 ** CloudLink tunnel ID/Connection settings are retained.
 * *License Management:*
 ** The AMIZcloud Portal prompts the user to manually deactivate any licenses in License Center if they no longer apply, as license ownership and usage can differ between the owner and user.

summary: As an org owner, I want to transfer a QNAP device from organization usage to my QID usage directly through the Portal, so I can manage the device under my personal account without needing to initiate the transfer from the device
description:
_Acceptance Criteria:_
 * *Transfer Process:*
 ** Upon initiating the transfer from the Portal, a QID Token is generated and stored, which can only bind to the requesting QID (must be the Org Owner).
 ** The device rebinds to the personal QID upon its next heartbeat, using the QID Token.
 ** If the device receives updates via API calls before rebind, the original Org Token remains valid until the rebind is successful.
 ** After rebind, the device ID remains the same, but it no longer has Site info.
 * *Access Control:*
 ** Clear the existing Access Control list.
 ** Switch the device to Private Mode, accessible only by the device owner.
 * *SSL Certificate:*
 ** If using Let's Encrypt, the SSL certificate remains valid.
 ** If using TWCA (QTS 5.1.0 and above), the certificate remains valid as long as License Center is installed.
 * *Notification:*
 ** A notification is sent to AMIZcloud/myQNAPcloud with the message: "Device \{device_name} has transferred to personal QNAP Account (a***g@qnap.com)."
 * *AMIZcloud Agent:*
 ** AMIZcloud Agent continues to report data using the same Device ID.

_Common Tasks for Both Scenarios_
 * *AMIZcloud Data Handling:*
 ** The user is prompted to decide whether to clear or retain historical data (CPU/Memory/Storage Pool Usage/Volume Usage Trend/Enclosure Temperature, Fan Speed, Performance metrics, and Event Logs) collected by AMIZcloud Agent.
 * *DDNS:*
 ** DDNS settings are retained, and internal/external port modifications are detected and reported using the original token.
 * *myQNAPcloud Link:*

description:
{code}
cmjq21kh33sc73djlni0 (ROOT)/     -> qqqnap read
└── cmjptich33sc73djlheg (A)/            -> qqqnap read
     └── cmjptksh33sc73djli10 (B)/     -> just13 read, qqqnap read
          └── cmjptm4h33sc73djli5g (C)/   -> just13 read
               └── cmjptpsh33sc73djlibg (D.txt)       -> qqqnap write
{code}

給定一串 objects 路徑，每個 object 右方標記了該 object 獨自定義分享給了哪個 qid 及權限為何

假設以 qqqnap 身份在編輯 D.txt 的分享時，qqqnap 應該要{color:#DE350B}不能{color}夠 unshare just13 對於 D.txt 的 (read)權限，但目前的版本卻會允許，所以需要修正。

註：
之前的邏輯有問題，當時是拿 qqqnap 及 just13 的 top writable index 來比較能否讓 qqqnap unshare just13，而以此例來看其實正確的做法應該要拿 qqqnap 的 top writable index 來跟 just13 的 top {color:#DE350B}readable{color} index 才對

建立
{code}
ROOT/
    t0 (cqtc1r2fch0s7383anb0)/
        t1(cqtc1sqfch0s7383ang0)/            -> qqqnap can write
            t2(cqtc1v2fch0s7383anmg)/        -> qqqnap can read
                t3(cquqertd5pos73ebkuhg)  +  {some files}(cqtc21ifch0s7383ao4g)
{code}

Steps:
1. share t2 to qqqnap with read
2. share t1 to qqqnap with write
3. login qqqnap, go to "shared with me" and then go into t2
4. portal will get http500 response from backend
{code}
GET https://q2.dev.myqnapcloud.io/v1/shared/object?parent_id=cqtc1v2fch0s7383anmg&show_sharing_info=true
"error":"runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference"
qif-gitlab.dev-myqnapcloud.com/q2/q2-backend/pkg/service.(*ObjectOps).SetInferredObjSharings\n\t/home/chester/hd/codebase/nas/q2/d/q2-backend/pkg/service/object_ops.go:1003
{code}

--
{code}
GET {{local_api_domain}}/v1/shared/object?parent_id=cqtc1sqfch0s7383ang0&show_sharing_info=true
"error":"runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference"
qif-gitlab.dev-myqnapcloud.com/q2/q2-backend/pkg/service.(*ObjectOps).SetInferredObjSharings\n\t/home/chester/hd/codebase/nas/q2/d/q2-backend/pkg/service/object_ops.go:1003
{code}

而且同樣的試法在沒有 share to anyone 的版本時一樣會掛掉。
以下為測試過的 q2-backend-api 版本：
---
fail version:
1.1.3.1012
1.1.2.1021 或更新
---
ok version:
1.1.2.1020 或更舊

description: https://qnap-jira.qnap.com.tw/browse/CLDMQC00-683

下面是 Couchbase 之前視訊介紹時提供的文件，而他們 2024/08/14 會來台灣，為了利於當天討論做更深入的了解，我們需要先看一下他們的文件並建立 Couchbase 測試帳號來實際跑跑看。

Couchbase data durability and transaction - 
https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/data/transactions.html

Couchbase index including Functional Index -
https://docs.couchbase.com/server/current/learn/services-and-indexes/indexes/indexing-and-query-perf.html

Couchbase Cloud Solution Capella Trial Sign-up - 
https://cloud.couchbase.com/sign-up

Capella Labs as a Beginner - 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13gUzPqdO_FUoYHO1pJ6huU3imH4PWCVs

--------------
[on-premise installation]
Here you go Couchbase installation guide.

On Couchbase trial account: it’s a credit-based commercial model and the cadence of credit burn depends on the cluster size you setup, and there scheduled hibernation to help you optimize your usage. On general we offer starter pack of 1000, 5000, and 25000 credits.
                                                                                                                                                                    

To have a general idea of how long these credits can sustain different types of workloads:
1.      A single-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, applicable for only dev and testing workloads, costs:
a.      ~200 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b.      ~60 credits per month when scheduled to be on only during office hours
2.      A 3-node (4vCPU, 16GB RAM) cluster, suitable production workloads and can hosts multiple applications with our bucket-based data structure, costs:
a.      ~700 credits per month when turned on 24/7
b.      ~200 credits per month when scheduled turned on only during office hours

Like I mentioned the key benefits of converting to Capella starter pack is the entitlement to Capella support service with a service level defined. If you would like to explore further, we can have @Tony Chung send you pricing ballparks.

安裝說明：
https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/install-kubernetes.html
https://docs.couchbase.com/operator/current/howto-couchbase-create.html
安裝完後可用如："couchbase://cb-example.q2.svc.cluster.local"進行連接

summary: As a user, I would like to share my Q2 storage data to non-QID, so they can also access my files without QID account - part 7
[Bug] Cannot upload file on cloudshare page

description:
space owner 的資料夾結構如下：
space 根目錄 / anyone_can_read / qqqnap_can_write /

以下依序：
1、分享 qqqnap_can_write 給 qqqnap 這個 qid 寫入的權限
2、分享 anyone_can_read 給 anyone 讀取的權限
3、browser 在無痕不登入 qid 的情況下，開兩個空白 tab 
4、第一個 tab 使用 anyone_can_read 這個資料夾的 shared link 進到 cloud share 頁面
5、第二個打開 myQNAPcloud portal 並登入 qid
6、對第一個 tab 按重新整理，此時會發現仍維持在匿名
7、對第二個 tab 按重新整理，此時會看到 portal 打 {code} GET https://www.dev.myqnapcloud.com/logout {code} 做登出


預期：
無痕的兩個 tab 能正常顯示 qid 並且不會自動做登出

summary: As a user I want to be informed and provided with a way to download my encryption key after setting or changing it, so I am aware that this is the last time I can view and download this key
description:
https://qnap-confluence.qnap.com.tw/display/QCLOUD/Software+Requirement+Specs
#69

h3. Acceptance Criteria:

*Scenario 1: Create Encryption Key Flow*  
* Given the user has entered the Encryption Key and set the inactivity idle lock time  
* When the user clicks the "Create Personal Vault" button  
* Then a dialog should be displayed with the title "Manage Encryption Key"  

*Scenario 2: Change Encryption Key Flow*  
* Given the user has entered the current encryption key and set the new encryption key  
* When the user clicks the "Continue" button  
* Then a dialog should be displayed with the title "Manage Encryption Key"

*Scenario 3: Dialog Display*  
* Title: "Manage Encryption Key"
* Content: 
  * "Your encryption key has been set successfully. This is the last time this security credential will be available for download."
* Encryption Key Display: 
  * The encryption key is shown with a hide/show icon and a copy icon.
* Buttons: 
  * Download Key: Initiates the download of the encryption key.
  * Close: Closes the dialog and returns to the root of the space.

*Scenario 4: Download Key Functionality*  
* Given the dialog is displayed  
* When the user clicks the "Download Key" button  
* Then a txt file named "myQNAPcloud Storage Configure" should be generated  
* And the file should contain:
  * "myQNAPcloud Storage"
  * "Encryption Key: {encryption_key}"
* And the user is prompted to download the file

*Scenario 5: Close Button Functionality*  
* Given the dialog is displayed  
* When the user clicks the "Close" button  
* Then the dialog closes  
* And the user is navigated back to the root of the space

summary: Enhance the Download Encryption Key Process in QC-3.1.5
[Q2] Create a cronjob to disclose non-sensitive environment variable values
description:
因為我們無法直接查到 alpha or pr site 起的 pod 的參數 (環境變數) 的值，需要確認時就得透過 OP 幫忙查。
為了減少頻繁請 OP 確認的動作，所以打算直接寫一個 cronjob 每天起來一次把 pod 的參數印在 log 中，這樣我們就能直接在 grafana 上查詢了。

不過需要注意的是，要濾掉一些機密資訊，如：mongodb、redis、amazon keyspaces
過濾方法可以考慮把該 value 只保留頭或尾幾個字元，其它字元改用星號代替。
例如只顯示前3跟後3字元，中間直接忽略原長度變成固定3個星號。而總長度小於等於6時直接全顯示。

要印的部分有兩塊，分別是 pod 的環境變數 及 viper get 到的值。
兩種都印的好處是能交叉比對結果來判斷是有有值未設定到之類。

此 cronjob 一天一次即可

summary: Define Framework for Service/Application Health Monitoring
description:
* AMIZcloud Agent 會在地端提供一個 Framework 
** Framework 允許各個 service/app 來註冊
** 各個 service/app 實作自己的 monitoring CGI，如果用現成的也行，就是提供 CGI 打法給 AMIZcloud Agent
** 可以指定測試 Interval （e.g. 30 min, 45 min, 60 min)，會與AMIZcloud Agent 打得 System CGI 錯開
** 可以指定錯誤的 Retry Count/Interval (e.g. 每五分鐘 Retry 1 次，3 次錯誤以上就算服務有問題，AMIZcloud Agent 發送 Service Abnormal Status 到 Cloud) 
** 地端會自動控制，每特定秒數區間內，只能呼叫一隻 CGI，避免系統產生loading
* 除了App 實作 Monitoring CGI，另外JIRA 的 App 上架單新增欄位：
** Service Monitoring CGI 的 Checkbox
*** 如果有打勾，DQV 上架單就必須要測試這隻 CGI 是否可正常運作，並且記錄各個平台(x86/ARM_AL/ARM_KW...)所花費的時間與CPU
* AMIZcloud Server
** 實作之前 Meiji 提的 AMIZcloud 在雲端的 Event Incident，顯示在 AMIZcloud Portal 
*** 如果是 QPKG 服務，可以詢問User是否想要重啟這個服務，如果Yes --> 直接呼叫 App Center 的 Restart App CGI
** 提供 API 給其他服務查詢，某台裝置的特定服務是否運作正常
* 注意事項：
** 不可以讓機器無法進入休眠狀態，如果機器進入休眠，這些 Status check CGI 將不會被執行

summary: [ACC-MF] Investigate Slow loading and Fix the issue.
description:
Current Loading Without Caching:
 * ~5+ seconds
 ** ~2+ on language file
 ** ~1+ seconds on large images and CSS file

With Cache
 * ~2 seconds

 

Issues Found:
 * Large language files each file is about 800KB which take about 2+ seconds to load.
 * Loading language file multiple times (3 times). This is due to current MF model infrastructure.
 * Large Image files which some of them are using large resolution.
 * Large CSS files
 * Some files could be moved to CDN to improve loading and caching.
 * Routing sometimes take long time due to some pages might have been a separated app that will required to reload the page again.

Fixes:
 * Reduce some of the images size
 * Reduce CSS file size
 * Move some of the files over to CDN
 * Consolidate and wrap current 4 separated apps in one app and let the host app doing all the routing in react.
 * Fix the multiple language file loading by initialize the i18next module in the host app and expose the module over to remote (require model changes)
 * Consider move l10n files over to cdn to improve loading speed and caching

 

Tried Using Module Federation instead of Single-SPA loading does not really improve a lot for loading scenario however this might improve the issue where sometimes long loading causes Single-SPA apps to timeout and fail to load.

Observe more for future modifications on whether or not to continue using Single-SPA framework or Module Federation only.

Comparison:

With Cache set to disabled on network tab:
 * DEV (After Tuning): 1.1 ~ 2
 * Alpha: 4.8 ~ 8+

With Cache
 * DEV (After Tuning): 0.7 ~ 1.2
 * Alpha : 1.73 ~ 3.8

Plugin Description:根據應用程式自我報告的版本號，jQuery 的版本低於 3.4.0。因此，它可能會受到原型污染弱點影響，這是因為 'extend' 函式可遭誘騙而修改 'Object' 的原型。請注意，掃描程式並未測試這些問題，而是僅依據應用程式自我報告的版本號碼做出判斷。Solution:升級至 jQuery 3.4.0 或更新版本。

Plugin Description:根據應用程式自我報告的版本號，AngularJS 的版本低於 1.7.9。因此，它可能會受到透過 merge() 函式產生的原型污染弱點影響。請注意，掃描程式並未測試這些問題，而是僅依據應用程式自我報告的版本號碼做出判斷。Solution:升級至 AngularJS 1.7.9 版或更新版本

Plugin Description:根據應用程式自我報告的版本號，Lodash 的版本低於 4.17.12。因此，它會受到 defaultsDeep 函式中的原型污染弱點影響，攻擊者可誘騙其使用建構函式承載來新增或修改 Object.prototype 的屬性。請注意，掃描程式並未測試這些問題，而是僅依據應用程式自我報告的版本號碼做出判斷。Solution:升級至 Lodash 4.17.12 或更新版本

description:
目前有些 testcase 的成功失敗會跟 db 當下的資料有較緊密的關聯，導致如果同時有一個以上的 CI/CD 在執行時，就有機會造成其中一個或全部都失敗。

預期的解決方式 (dev site 限定) 是每次 CI/CD 做 unit test 時都會建出獨立的、新的 database name，並在 unit test 結束時(不論成功或失敗)就再自動將該 database 刪掉。

summary: [Production site]申請 app_id for QCloud API to get the access token and invoke cloud package API
description:
h2. 申請內容
 * APP name: QuRouter OS
 ** [~andyfung@qnap.com] 想麻煩你連同 Alpha site QuRouter app name 也更新為 "QuRouter OS"
 ** QuRouter 後續預計使用此 app_id 串接 QNAP Account Center 認證。據我觀察，App name 將會顯示在認證連結 https://account.qnap.com/oauth/auth?response_type=code&client_id=\{app_id}
 * Scope: Count the number of QuRouter firmware updates.
 * Site: Alpha and Production
 * 申請人: [irischen@qnap.com|mailto:irischen@qnap.com]
 * Alpha 測試單 - {color:#00875a}Pass{color} QWSHORA0-10352 [Internal] QuRouter 韌體更新下載量統計

h2. 目的

QuRouter 預計將韌體更新內容回傳至雲端，藉以統計版本更新數量。
h2. Remark

summary: [QVRProClient(Android)] 於 QVR Pro Client (Android) 2.6.2.250203 透過 QUTK 進行登入，登入所花時間未能穩定，花費時間的區間為 4 - 14 秒
description:
Reproduce Steps：

1. 全新安裝 QVRProClient(Android) 2.6.2.250203
2. 開啟 QVRProClient
3. 登入 QNAP ID
4. 長按 Server 透過 QUTK 方式登入
5. 確認登入時間是否超過 3 秒

Actual Results：

1. 於 QVR Pro Client (Android) 2.6.2.250203 透過 QUTK 進行登入，登入所花時間未能穩定，花費時間的區間為 4 - 14 秒
2. 現進行約 1000 次平均時間約為 5 - 6 秒，最久有 14 秒
3. {color:#de350b}*目前確認到最不穩定的時間為台灣時間 PM 9 ~ AM 1 點，已觀察兩天，相同時段有相同問題，會再觀察一天*{color}
4. 可參考 : [https://dqv-dashboard.qnap.com.tw:3000/d/414dq8w48qw/61632_qvrproclient-android-_qutk_duration?orgId=1&from=now-2d&to=now]

Expected Results：

於 QVR Pro Client (Android) 2.6.2.250203 透過 QUTK 進行登入，登入所花時間應要穩定，花費時間應要在 3 秒內

Bug from：

QVRPCL00-3030 [T2][DQV3-Auto][QVRProClient(Android)] 於 QVR Pro Client 使用 QUTK 進行操作 - 效能測試
https://qnap-jira.qnap.com.tw/browse/QVRPCL00-3030

summary: [QVRProClient(Android)] 於 QVR Pro Client (Android) 2.6.2.250203 透過 QUTK 登入，登入時間超過 3 秒
description:
Reproduce Steps：

1. 全新安裝 QVRProClient(Android) 2.6.2.250203
2. 開啟 QVRProClient
3. 登入 QNAP ID
4. 長按 Server 透過 QUTK 方式登入
5. 確認登入時間是否超過 3 秒

Actual Results：

1. 於 QVR Pro Client (Android) 2.6.2.250203 透過 QUTK 登入，登入時間超過 3 秒
2. 現進行約 800 次平均時間約為 5 - 6 秒，最久有 14 秒
3. 可參考 : https://dqv-dashboard.qnap.com.tw:3000/d/414dq8w48qw/61632_qvrproclient-android-_qutk_duration?orgId=1&from=now-2d&to=now

Expected Results：

於 QVR Pro Client (Android) 2.6.2.250203 透過 QUTK 登入，登入時間不應超過 3 秒

Bug from：

QVRPCL00-3030 [T2][DQV3-Auto][QVRProClient(Android)] 於 QVR Pro Client 使用 QUTK 進行操作 - 效能測試
https://qnap-jira.qnap.com.tw/browse/QVRPCL00-3030

summary: [QVR Human] 申請上傳 App 使用數據至 QAP
description:
*+需求來源:+*

1. 新政府採取數據導向政策來審視各 App 的執行成果, 因此除了 App Center 下載數量與 Software Store 授權販售數量之外, 需要更多可以觀察用戶實際應用情境的數據來佐證和幫助產品規劃。 

2. 部門內部開立單據規劃此需求 Story QVRHUMAN-1977 [QVR Human] 上傳 App 使用數據至 QAP 並做成可視化報表

*+需求內容:+*

1. 經 QVR Human PM/RD 討論後, 依據所需蒐集的數據內容, 定義所需欄位資訊如附件檔案 : [^QAP Analytics Platform record for QAI - QVR Human.xlsx]

summary: [ManageDumplog] AMP 平台 QuWAN Collection ID 申請
description:
3/25 會議討論 blob service + amp 可供 QuWAN upload dumplog 功能串接。

此單申請 QuWAN 在 amp 需用到的 Collection ID，請協助提供三組 ID 予下面三個 site 使用。
 # production site
 # alpha site
 # QA site

QuWAN Orchestrator 2.7.0.0009 做為 2.7.0 候選發行版本，請協助部署到Alpha Site上，將bug修正及規格提供DQV驗證。

+*Scope*+

*Enhancement*
 # QUWAN-8856[IP衝突檢查] Join QuWAN IP 衝突檢查對象調整 - 放寬 route-based VPN subnet

*Bug Fixed*
 # QUWAN-8928 [QuWAN] 使用 2025 購買的 License，點選更新 License 時，會跳出權限不足，且不會跳轉到 License Center
 # QUWAN-8935 [Policy Route] 於 Dest 欄位輸入的 IP 若與 VPN Subnet 相同，按下 apply 會跳 error 400，應再 欄位 上設定時，就要擋下來
 # QUWAN-8933[Policy Route] 於 Source IP 欄位輸入 IP pool，按下套用後會跳出 error

----
+*2.7.0.0008 Scope*+

*Enhancement*
 # QUWAN-8882[Policy-based Route] IP Address 輸入格式支援 IP Range
 # QUWAN-8919[Policy-based Route] Rule 數量設定上限 50 條

*Bug Fixed*
 # QUWAN-8834 - [Event logs] 刪除offline 的設備後，在Event log 看到「[QuWAN] Failed to delete \{DualWANE}. Error code: \{581}. Try again. If the issue persists, contact QNAP Customer Service. 」
 # QUWAN-8835 - [Event logs] 勾選並刪除兩筆 QuWAN Device，Event logs 共出現四筆 delete log
 # QUWAN-8908[QuWAN vRouter] Alpha site 的 Send Join key 按鈕顯示不明確

 
----
+*2.7.0.0007 Scope*+

*Change*
 # QUWAN-8785Modify route-based VPN schema for RDS v17 migration
 # QUWAN-8733 QuWAN/QuNMS RDS 升級到 17.2

*Bug Fixed*
 # QUWAN-8783 [Change log] Segment 內有多筆 QoS rule / Firewall rule 條件下，當去 Delete rule 時，會同時印出其他筆 rule 有被 edit 的行為，新增 / 修改 沒有此問題
 # QUWAN-8784 [Event log] 從 segment 新增 / 修改 / 刪除 QoS Rule，於 event log 會同時印出 Device 有新增 / 修改 / 刪除 的操作，同樣手法下，Firewall 沒有此問題
 # QUWAN-8814 [Route-based VPN] 建立好 Route-based VPN 後，透過 Profile -> Details 使用 ping 功能，會跳出 error 400，PR site QuWAN 沒有此問題
 # QUWAN-8781 [QuWAN] Topology setting - 連續對 Edge 執行兩次 check vpn type，即使 check vpn type 完成，顯示出 device role ，GUI 仍會定期刷新
 # QUWAN-8800 [Orchestrator UI] Adjust traffic quality chart legend label
 # QUWAN-8738 (MJ request) 同步雲端App 樣式版型 GUI Quality Review

----
+*2.7.0.0006 Scope*+

*Bug Fixed*
|QUWAN-8700|[QuWAN] Alpha site 打開 Deivce / Traffic report 時，右下角會顯示error 400|
|QUWAN-8690|[Policy Route] 於 Destination 選擇 Domain 後，目前可以輸入 IP Address ，應加強 Domain 格式檢查，顯示對應的錯誤訊息|
|QUWAN-8757|[QuWAN Device] 使用 自動化穩定性環境測試中，於12/23 早上 8點 06分~8點10分，Alpha site 的 DualWANQHora 顯示 Device Status 為 offline，但 WAN / VPN 顯示為 online|
|QUWAN-8758|[Policy Route] Nexthop 選擇為 IP Address 的條件下，enable NAT mode 後，UI 仍會顯示沒有 enable NAT ，且檢查 Device 底層，顯示沒有過 NAT|
|QUWAN-8747|[Debug log file] 地端 /var/log/telemetric log 的 log rotate目前只有一份，( cloudagent 的 log 會存 20 份)，建議 telemetric 的 rotate log 數量可以增加，方便後續deug|
|QUWAN-8750|[QuWAN] 比對 Production site，Alpha site 左側功能列的名稱無法完整顯示出來|
|QUWAN-8760|[Policy Route]預設條件下，當 Nexthop = IP Address 時， QuWAN 與 QuRouter 對於顯示 NAT 的方式，行為不一致|
|QUWAN-8749|[QuWAN] 比對 Production site 左側工具列的設計，Alpha site 看起來較為擁擠|
|QUWAN-8669|[Policy Route] 建議 QuWAN profile name 的命名行為可以與 QuRouter 行為一致|
|QUWAN-8372|[System logs] 修改 Device Segment settings 後，Event Logs/Change Logs 顯示的是 「[QuWAN] Updated Quality of Service. Segment: \{custom} -> \{1}.」應調整成 Device segment?|
|QUWAN-8373|[System Logs\Changed Logs] Firewall src/dest 選擇 segment 後，logs 應該顯示 segment name，目前顯示 segment id 「Source: {Defined: [16a682de-74cd-42e8-a9d8-99c20537d13e]}
」|
|QUWAN-8768|[QuWAN] Qhora301w / Hub 從 PPPoE mode 改成DHCP mode 以後，設備更新的 WAN IP 是 private IP，QuWAN \ Device list 內的Behind NAT / alert icon 不會顯示，QuWAN topology 內的 device 旁邊則會正常顯示|
|QUWAN-8759|[Policy Route] 預設條件下，QuWAN add policy Route 與 QuRouter add policy Route 顯示不一致|
|QUWAN-8735|[QuWAN] Client 選擇只有 Mac 的設備 ， 設定完成後，檢查 UI 上的欄位會顯示為空白|
|QUWAN-8744|[PPPoE] 當 QuRouter 的 port id 不等於 port number，去 QuWAN reconnect PPPoE 時，該功能不會動|

 
----
+*2.7.0.0005 Scope*+

*Changes*
 * QUWAN-8728[Service Port] 新增 Custom Service Port 數量上限為 100
 * QUWAN-8729[Static Route] Static Route Rule 數量上限 1024
 * QUWAN-8696Add Maximum limit of Segment

*Bug Fixed*

 * QUWAN-8708[QuWAN] 先選「不支援 Policy Route 的 Device」，再選「支援 Policy Route 的 Device」，檢查 Policy Route 的 tab 不會正確顯示出來，重新整理頁面就會長出來

 * QUWAN-8678[Policy Route] Enable QuWAN QBelt 的環境下，QuRouter 的 Source 選擇 VPN Server 時，不會顯示出 QuWAN QBelt VPN Server，同樣環境換成 vRouter ，就會正常顯示出 QuWAN QBelt VPN Server
 * QUWAN-8677[QuWAN] Source 選擇 Client，且該 Client 沒有 name 時，於 Client 欄位上會顯示會空白
 * QUWAN-8675[QuWAN] QuWAN 系統紀錄沒有WAN failover相關log

 

+*2.7.0.0004 Scope*+

*Spec* 
 * QUWAN-8147{color:#172b4d} {color}{color:#172b4d}Policy based route{color}
 * {color:#172b4d}QUWAN-8422[Orchestrator] GeoIP Version Info and Update{color}
 * QUWAN-8624雲地之間確認訊息傳遞的機制
 * QUWAN-8382[Orchestrator] 調整地端修改/刪除 system service port 限制條件
 * QUWAN-8635[System Log] 移除 Event Log 之 "User" 欄位
 * QUWAN-8388{color:#172b4d}[Orchestrator] Optimize the Login Failure Screen{color}
 * {color:#172b4d}QUWAN-8458 [Orchestrator] Adding Confirmation Window for FW Update{color}
 * QUWAN-8459[Orchestrator][VPN Server] Removing Beta tag of Privilege Settings - AzureAD and SAML
 * QUWAN-8508[Service Port] 重新定義 UI 允許輸入 port 數量上限 (vRouter)
 * QUWAN-8537[Orchestrator] Route-based VPN UI Enhancement - throughput & remote IP
 * 優化雲端溝通機制
 ** QUWAN-8571{color:#172b4d} {color}{color:#172b4d}Refine the procedure to provide siteinfo for GetSiteInfo API.{color}
 * Check VPN type 讓地端觸發
 ** QUWAN-8615[Orchestrator] Revise the tigger for Hub capability detection
 * 建議 IP 要避開 org WAN IP
 ** QUWAN-8494Suggestion IP 需避開 Org 裡的 WAN

*Bug Fixed*
 * QUWAN-8628[QuWAN]WAN Failover無法顯示Tier1/2 & Weight
 * QUWAN-8629[QuWAN] Failover to Tier2, QuWAN UI仍顯示當前Active Ter是Tier1
 * QUWAN-8633[QuWAN]WAN Failover預設欄位是"縮排", 位置不顯眼, 建議調整展開顯示
 * QUWAN-8591[QuWAN] 在兩個Hub 配一個Edge的環境下，將 Hub_1 offline的同時，在Hub_2 Local GUI leave QuWAN，edge 不會收到 site_info的更新，維持在 "HUB" : "1", "HUBS" : [ "2", "1" ]；若offline/leave quwan執行，則無此問題，Edge會收到site_info - "HUB" : "1", "HUBS" : [ "1" ]
 * QUWAN-8561[QuWAN] 使用 PPPoE 自動化重播測試，有機率發生 PPPoE 重播後，Device 的 System Status 沒有顯示出IP
 * QUWAN-8495[QuWAN] 建議 Quick fix 也要檢查與其他Device WAN IP 是否有衝突
 * QUWAN-8357[QuWAN] 使用 PPPoE 自動重播工具測試 QuRouter，測試第 50 次時，遇到 QuWAN 沒有正確顯示出 IP 的狀況，且會造成 VPN 不通

summary: [QuRouter] 支援 QuRouter 可轉移綁定 Org 與 QID
description:
+*Background*+

QuWAN 未來希望提供裝置先 join QuWAN 後才選擇 org 的彈性，

因此需要讓 QuRouter 裝置可以有 leave org 後綁定到 QID 上的功能，這樣才能在 login QuWAN 的情況下接著選擇其他要 join 的 org，讓機器再從 QID 轉移到 org。

summary: [RD owner] [Account Center] QuWAN Auto Refresh Account Center Session to "stay logged in"
description:
+*Background*+

因 Account Center 登入認證後拿到的 token session 設計為一小時，因此只要超過一小時，有發生頁面重新載入的行為時，就會被系統判定為無效 session。

+*Requirement*+

QuWAN "保持登入"，有在使用就不要登出 。

需跟 Account Center 確認，如果有去 reload 頁面的話，距離登入超過一個小時就會確認 session 是否還有效；希望有在動作的話就自動做 refresh session，抓個時間長度內都不要重新驗證 session。

summary: Alpha account center allows login_status from domain other than *.qnap.com
description: QuWAN在開發測試時會有dev site的RD namespace 及local host for k8s. 因此會以自訂網域名稱呼叫alpha site 的account center  login_status。目前這個API阻擋了來自非qnap.com的domain 呼叫。與目前的管理員[~andyfung@qnap.com] 討論過後，開單請他幫忙打開。

summary: 需 Account Center 降版以驗證 QuWAN 登入行為
description:
Hi Account Center team,

承先前 teams 討論，因目前 pr site 仍為舊版 account center，因此 QuWAN 發行前希望 Alpha site 上 account center 可以與 pr site 版本一致，以確認登入行為無虞。

 

另請協助提供查詢 account center 版本資訊的方式讓 DQV 可以留存測試結果，謝謝。

（如無查詢方式再請提供 alpha site 上 新舊版本與 pr site 上版本的資訊）

summary: [SSL Certificate] [License Center] 從h5.2.4升至5.3.0會自動釋出已下載並安裝的SSL憑證。
description:
Overview:
從h5.2.4升至h5.3.0會自動釋出已下載並安裝的SSL憑證。
降板回h5.2.4後卻回到已套用SSL憑證的狀態。
Note: 只有從License Center加入的SSL授權才會有此問題，套用myQNAPcloud中購買的SS憑證不會因升到h5.3.0自動釋出

Steps:
1. 將NAS版本安裝為QuTShero h5.2.4
2.透過QID加入myQNAPcloud
3.在License Center套用SSL憑證的授權
4.下載並安裝SSL憑證(與License Center的SSL相同)
5.將NAS FW 升至 QuTShero h5.3.0
6.確認SSL憑證是否被自動釋出

Actual Result: SSL憑證被自動釋出。

Expected Result: SSL憑證不會被自動釋出。

summary: [SSL Certificate][Alpha] [Hero 6.x.x] 無法下載並套用License Center內的憑證。
description:
Overview:無法下載並套用License Center內的憑證，但Let's Encrypt和在myQNAPcloud > SSL憑證頁面購買的憑證皆可正常下載並套用。



Steps:
1. 將任一裝置加入myQNAPcloud
2.用相同QID在SW購買SSL憑證
3.在NAS裝置的License Center啟用該憑證
4.確認下載並安裝SSL憑證是否失敗

Actual Result: 會顯示"下載憑證失敗"。

Expected Result: 可正常下載憑證。

summary: [SSL cert.] HDD wakes up from standby mode when running SSL cert. internal operation.
description:
[SSL cert.] HDD wakes up from standby mode when running SSL cert. internal operation.
 
Step :
 
1.Setup NAS
2.Make HDD to go to standby
3.Keep no access to NAS
4.Monitoring NAS status
 
使用fswatch 1.amd64 放置tmp下去執行
 
sudo fswatch.amd64 -silent-mode <ENTER>
 
當CTRL+C把程式終止時..會印出過去所檢驗出來有變動的檔案以及程式
 
Actual Result :
 
HDD still wakeup caused running
 
"/usr/bin/openssl"
 
Expect Result :
 
Not wakeup HDD from stnadby mode when running
/mnt/HDA_ROOT/.config/QcloudSSLCertificate/cert/cert
 
(if not necessary)
 
|Program|Read/Write Route|Function |
|/usr/bin/openssl|/mnt/HDA_ROOT/.config/QcloudSSLCertificate/cert/cert|SSL cert.|


Model : TVS-871
FW : 5.2.3.3006-20250108
MJ NAS :
172.17.20.26
qadmin / Qnap13888

summary: [SSL Certificate] [License Center] 以組織裝置加入myQNAPcloud時，無法在License Center停用SSL的授權
description:
Overview:
先以個人裝置登入myQANPcloud和License Center後，啟用SSL授權，再解除myQNAPcloud的綁定，並重新以組織裝置登入myQNAPcloud，會無法在License Center停用該SSL授權。

Steps:
1.先購買一個SSL授權
2.以個人裝置登入myQANPcloud和License Center
3.在License Center啟用SSL授權
4.解除myQNAPcloud的綁定，並重新以組織裝置登入myQNAPcloud
5.確認是否無法在License Center停用該SSL授權

Actual Result: 以組織裝置登入myQNAPcloud，無法在License Center停用個人QID的SSL授權。

Expect Result:  應提示使用者須以個人裝置登入myQNAPcloud才可停用個人QID的SSL授權。

summary: [MPM Confirm] [QNAP live update] [QuTS Hero]SSL Certificate 2.2.56 Release
description:
Hi DQV,

Please help to verify the latest version of myQNAPcloud SSL Certificate QPKG:
h2. [注意]

此單目的為上架到QuTS hero h5.3.0 App Center，
除了原本的功能測試外，{color:#ff0000}請DQV在hero h5.3.0 且有HA服務的環境下，
測試QPKG在HA Manager執行takeover後，還可以運作正常。{color}

{color:#ff0000}[QPKG Support HA 測試說明.pptx|https://ieinet-my.sharepoint.com/:p:/g/personal/seanchang_qnap_com/EeRAGxARoyVNsFlM2t7yAIYB2XGYf-XOe2DvDvjfZyNO1A?e=SMA3Ed&isSPOFile=1]{color}
h2. [New Features]
* Support for High Availability (HA) Environments:
** Only one myQNAPcloud Device will be created in an HA setup.
** The myQNAPcloud service will operate exclusively on the Active Node.
** Both Nodes will share the same SSL Certificate. 

h2. [Bugs Fixed]
* QTSSSLCT-593 [Hero_HA][APP Testing] [QuTS Hero]SSL Certificate 2.2.56 無法取得LET'S Encrypt 憑證
* QTSSSLCT-567	[SSL Certificate] SSL Certificate show "Expired" status (but license center is "Expires soon" )

h2. [Known Issue]
* QTSSSLCT-592 [Hero_HA][SSL Certificate 2.2.56 ][APP]在APP CENTER QPKG 視窗無資訊及簡介圖 SSL Certificate 2.2.56
** 需要等待 Store Publish 單開立後才可以進行設定

Thanks
